title: Cook It Allergy Free & Dealing with Food Allergies
description:
The key to allergy-free cooking is to substitute and separate. With these steps, everyone can enjoy meals and stay safe from an allergic reaction.

Planning meals around food allergens, whether for you or your child, doesn‚Äôt have to be complicated and stressful. All it takes is certain kitchen organization tactics and some simple food swaps.

Any food could provoke an allergic reaction, says Matthew Greenhawt, MD, an allergist at the University of Michigan Allergy Clinic and an assistant professor at the division of allergy and immunology with the University of Michigan Health Center in Ann Arbor. But he says eight foods account for 90 percent of food allergies: milk, eggs, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, and soy.

It‚Äôs rare, but some people, especially children and young adults, can have a severe, life-threatening allergic reaction (anaphylaxis) if they come in contact with these foods. So you want to keep them not only out of dishes you prepare, but also away from ‚Äúsafe‚Äù foods to avoid cross-contamination.

Packing a lunch Free-From the top food allergens is easy with Enjoy Life Foods. All Enjoy Life products are free from wheat, gluten, dairy, peanuts, tree nuts, egg, soy, fish and shellfish, so pack school lunches with confidence.

Give your child their lunchtime favorites knowing each snack and treat from Enjoy Life Foods is allergy-friendly, gluten-free, non-GMO and contains no artificial ingredients. Each product is made at a special, allergy-free facility, so you can nosh without worry. Those living with celiac disease, a gluten intolerance or even a sensitivity can snack away too. All Enjoy Life Foods are gluten and wheat free. And that‚Äôs not all! Products never contain genetically modified organism (GMO) ingredients. With Enjoy Life you can expect delicious natural ingredients, with no artificial anything. So go ahead and eat freely!

The Food Allergens app aims to assist people living with food allergies, which are:
How to Live With a Soy Allergy
How to Get Tested for Food Allergies
How to Deal with Food Allergies
How to Treat Allergies
How to Live With Food Allergies
How to Recognize Peanut Allergies
How to Live With Allergies to Corn
How to Cope with a Milk Allergy
How to Live With an Allergy to Seafood

Food allergies are a defensive response by your immune system to a specific food protein that you may eat. Food allergies are relatively uncommon, affecting 6 ‚Äì 8% of children and up to 3% of adults, and they can have symptoms that range from mild to life-threatening.But by eliminating trigger foods and caring for your overall well-being, you can successfully deal with your food allergies.
Food allergies can be minor or they can be a major health risk ‚Äî even deadly. They can cause hives, constipation, diarrhea, bloating, anaphylaxis (closing of throat), or rash. When testing for food allergies, it is important you do not try to diagnose it on your own.

It has a list of all the common allergens, where they are found, foods to avoid, alternatives and baking ingredient replacements.

title: Allergy Shot Reminder
description:
Allergy shots are often done on a walk-in basis at regular intervals based on how long a patient has been receiving those shots.

This is an easy to use application that can be configured by the user based on how many shots are required and at what intervals.  For example, new patients may be receiving three shots per week, while other patients may be only receiving one shot per month.  This application will send a daily notification to the user at the requested time of day to remind the user when the next shot is due, and will continue sending daily reminders until the last shot date is updated -- a one-click operation.

App is free with no ads.

title: Allergy Smart Shopper Free
description:
If you buy groceries for people with allergies, and you've ever spent hours in the grocery store trying to read ingredient labels and decide which products are safe to buy, then Allergy Smart Shopper is the perfect app for you! This app takes the hassle out of grocery shopping by helping you keep track of allergies and alerting you if certain products might not be safe to buy. 

Key Features:
* Allergy Tracking: Create lists of people and their allergies so you don't have to remember them all.
* Barcode Scanning: Scan product barcodes to see what ingredients they contain.
* Intelligent Analysis: Automatically cross-reference the ingredients in the products you scan with the allergy lists you create and determine if any ingredient poses an allergy risk.

Limitations of the FREE version:
* Banner ads.
* Full-screen ads will display after every 10 scans.
* Limited to 50 scans per day.

Note about our databases:
We are releasing this app with a limited product database for now. Product databases are very expensive to purchase and maintain, so we are relying on a combination of freely-available data sources for the first few releases. As a result, some people may find that this app successfully finds most of the products they scan, while others may not. If you find a barcode that is not supported by our database (you will see a "Product Not Found" message), please use the "Tell Us" button that the app presents to let us know about it. We will do our best to try and add every product that you tell us is missing!

title: Allergy Season
description: Allergy Season is a physics based nose defense game where the player must blow away allergens from getting into the nose by tapping around them to direct their path.

comments: Fun and challenging, will make you laugh as well.
Life changing

title: Allergy Translate
description:
Inspired by numerous close-calls when traveling, Allergy Translate is the indispensable travel app for food allergy sufferers.

Quickly and effectively communicate your allergies to waiters, food preparers and other non-English speakers while you are traveling the world and eating out. All translations have been done by professional native speakers to ensure their accuracy.

We currently support 28 languages and the major food allergens with plans to add even more in future releases. If there is something specific that you would like to see then please leave us some feedback.

title: WebMD: Check Symptoms, Rx Savings, & Find Doctors
description:
** Coronavirus / COVID-19 Outbreak: Tap the card on our home screen for the latest updates on the 2020 coronavirus outbreak. **

From WebMD, the one healthcare app you need to check symptoms; learn about conditions and drugs; research treatments and diagnoses; find doctors and specialists in your area; get Rx discounts available at your local pharmacy; and set medication reminders. 

Key Features: 

‚Ä¢ Symptom Checker ‚Äì Choose your symptoms, learn about potential conditions or issues, and lookup treatment and care options.
‚Ä¢ Doctor Directory ‚Äì Find the closest doctors and specialists based on your current location or search by city, state or zip. 
‚Ä¢ WebMD Rx ‚Äì We partner with major pharmacy chains to find the lowest prescription drug prices, which often beat insurance co-pays. It‚Äôs 100% free to use. No registration required.
‚Ä¢ Medication Reminders ‚Äì Never miss a dose. You‚Äôll receive reminders when it‚Äôs time to take your medications. View daily prescription schedules and instructions, plus pill images with dosage and timing information for each drug. 
‚Ä¢ Conditions ‚Äì Find medically-reviewed information about conditions relevant to you and learn more about causes, treatments, and related symptoms. 
‚Ä¢ Customization and Saving Functionality ‚Äì Save your conditions, drugs, doctors, hospitals, pharmacies, and healthy living articles for secure, easy access and reference. 
‚Ä¢ Drug Interaction Checker ‚Äì Find and identify potentially harmful and unsafe combinations of prescription medications by entering two or more drugs in question.

ABOUT WebMD
WebMD Health Corp. (Nasdaq: WBMD) is the leading provider of health information services, serving consumers, physicians, healthcare professionals, employers, and health plans through our public and private online portals, mobile platforms and health-focused publications. More than 95 million unique visitors access the WebMD Health Network each month.

If you are a California resident, California law may provide you with certain rights regarding our use of your personal information. For more information relevant to our users who are California residents, please review the "California Residents" section of our Privacy Policy linked on this download page or within our app.

The WebMD Health Network includes WebMD Health, Medscape, MedicineNet, emedicineHealth, RxList, theheart.org, drugs.com and Medscape Education.
SOURCE WebMD Health Corp.

WebMD. Better Information. Better Health.
WebMD does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on the WebMD mobile application.

recentChanges:
Introducing Profile.
All your saved health information is now stored in your profile.
- Save your doctors‚Äô contact information so it‚Äôs always on hand.
- Save Rx coupons for easy access at the pharmacy. Just show the Pharmacist the coupon on your phone, and save on prescriptions.
- All of your saved articles, drugs and conditions in one convenient place.
- See an overview of all your medication reminders.
comments: I have found that searching for certain terms, such as "dementia", will get no hits inside the app but will get plenty of hits on the WebMD website. I would say that about one-third of the time when I search for a condition or anasic keyword that obviously should get results, I get no results at all. So it would appear that the app does not have access to all of the content found on the Web MD website. To me, this means there is really no point in using the app.

A great resource for all things health and medical-related. I use the symptom checker feature the most, but the app also features articles on health conditions, information on different medications, and COVID articles. Definitely a great resource, and completely free!
This is such an app for info on medical anything. Including identifying pills that you find in your cabinet and can't remember or know what it is.

I've had and trusted the app for years, but about 2 months ago it suddenly started regularly spamming me with notifications with Corona news... Mostly scary and negative stories about people being reinfected, death and about immunization trials being cancelled by johnson and johnson due to safety concerns etc.... WHY ARE YOU SPAMMING ME WITH MORE FEAR MONGERING DON'T WE HAVE ENOUGH FEAR IN OUR LIVES!?!? I'm so furious. Sit on my phone and keep quiet until I need you. Notifications disabled
The drug interaction checker not working properly. Says it found 2 interactions but only describes 1.Shows it found 3 interactions but only describes 2...and so on.

title: Food Intolerances
description:
The app Food Intolerances is a tool to help everyone who has to stick to a restricted diet because of food intolerances or allergies. Typical application cases are: histamine intolerance, mastocytosis, fructose malabsorption, sorbitol intolerance, aspirin intolerance, gluten sensitivity, lactose intolerance or a diet low in FODMAPs.

Latest awards*:
Healthline ‚Äì Best Nutrition Apps 2019
MeinAllergiePortal ‚Äì Digital Health Heroes Award 2018
iMore ‚Äì Best Food Nutrition Apps 2017

It contains more than 1000 foods that are commented and rated in view of the following subjects: 


CARBOHYDRATE MALABSORPTION 
‚ñ™ Fructose
‚ñ™ Lactose
‚ñ™ Sorbitol and other sugar alcohols
‚ñ™ Oligosaccharides (e.g. fructans and galactans)
‚ñ™ FODMAPs (total)
‚ñ™ Sucrose


HISTAMINE INTOLERANCE
‚ñ™ Histamine content
‚ñ™ Tyramine content 
‚ñ™ Histamine liberators and DAO inhibitors 
‚ñ™ Problematic medicines
‚ñ™ Food additives 


SALICYLATE INTOLERANCE
‚ñ™ Salicylate content 
‚ñ™ Problematic food additives


NICKEL ALLERGY
‚ñ™ Nickel content


OTHER SENSITIVITIES AND ALLERGIES
Filters for gluten, wheat, soy, yeast, sulfites, dairy, egg, fish, meat, pork, beef and honey


MORE FEATURES 
‚ñ™ Detailed articles about food intolerances
‚ñ™ Possibility to write notes and manually adjust the rating
‚ñ™ Blog
‚ñ™ Direct link to Wikipedia articles
‚ñ™ No internet connection required


* https://www.baliza.de/en/blog/files/tag-awards.html
  https://www.baliza.de/blog/files/tag-auszeichnung.html

** This app doesn‚Äôt rate brand specific products, but common foods and basic food categories. It provides you with all the information needed to deal with your intolerance and to avoid common mistakes.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ 

The app does not replace medical care and must not be used for diagnostic purposes. While the information provided here has been compiled to the best knowledge of the author, mistakes happen, since this is a complex matter which depends closely on the individual person. We are constantly working to improve the app, but information may be wrong and may even contain harmful recommendations.

The Baliza GmbH disclaims any liability as a developer of this app for the accuracy, completeness and timeliness of the information and any resulting damages, consequential damages and other disadvantages. The assertion of claims of any kind is excluded. Some jurisdictions do not allow the limitation of liability for personal injury, or of incidental or consequential damages, so this limitation may not apply to you.

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ We added a new profile for nickel allergy.
‚Ä¢ All values are now displayed per portion.
‚Ä¢ We added the amount of excess fructose for each food.
‚Ä¢ We added more foods and revised some commentaries.
‚Ä¢ We revised several articles in the info section.
‚Ä¢ We added a link to our blog and to our privacy policy.

We hope you like the changes and would be very happy if you let us and other users know what you like about our app!
comments: It's a good start for me and worth the purchase. Surprising number of foods are missing. Looking forward to regular updates. The extra clinical info in the notes on many foods are very helpful.

I really liked this app until I had a salicylate reaction after I bought cranberry juice because they have it listed as green for salicylates, but it's actually Very High Salicylate. The wikipedia link they provided had no mention of the salicylate content of cranberries. It wasn't until I searched it further on reliable allergy sites that I came across it repeatedly marked as VHS. Very disappointed.

The app you've always needed!!! Let's you add multiple intolerances and visually colors them to help you see what you can and can't eat. Easy to update tolerances for multiple people. So simple love it!

Would be nice to filter only green/yellow+green categories and maybe save that filter. It would help to find out which type of foods aren't working for me and causing me issues. I think it's histamines but not sure yet.

I'm glad I decided to spend a little bit of money to buy this app. The food database is very big, the filter options work great and the info is solid. The only places where I saw inconsistencies with other sources are actually current subjects of debate in the scientific community so it seems like the creators did a very good job compiling the info. The only slight beef I have with the app is that it's not very appealing to the eye but the simplicity of the UI is great!

title: Allergy Travel Cards (Translate Your Allergies)
description:
Don't risk your health while you travel. 

This app communicates your food allergy cards in 36 languages for the 14 most common food allergies, or lifestyle choices, for over 500 unique allergy cards.

Allergy Travel Cards offers full offline support so you can travel with the app and not worry about needing network access. Cards can be downloaded, shared, kept in your notification tray for quick access, stored on the main page of the app or can be created on the fly. 

The free version is fully functioning and allows cards to be created in English, Dutch, Czech, French, German and Italian for all 14 food allergies.

The premium version offers all 36 languages, adding support for over 190 countries. 

Allergy cards for the following food allergies are provided - 
Gluten Allergy (Coeliac, Celiac, GF, Gluten)
Nut Allergy
Tree nut Allergy
Celery Allergy
Fish Allergy
Dairy Allergy (Lactose Allergy)
Lupin Allergy
Molluscs Allergy (Shellfish Allergy)
Mustard Allergy
Sesame Allergy
Soya Allergy
Sulphides / Sulfides Allergy
Crustaceans Allergy
Eggs Allergy


This app stores no personal data and has the smallest permissions possible (storage for downloading cards).

Eat Safely, throughout the world.
descriptionHTML:
Don't risk your health while you travel.

This app communicates your food allergy cards in 36 languages for the 14 most common food allergies, or lifestyle choices, for over 500 unique allergy cards.

Allergy Travel Cards offers full offline support so you can travel with the app and not worry about needing network access. Cards can be downloaded, shared, kept in your notification tray for quick access, stored on the main page of the app or can be created on the fly.

The free version is fully functioning and allows cards to be created in English, Dutch, Czech, French, German and Italian for all 14 food allergies.

The premium version offers all 36 languages, adding support for over 190 countries.

Allergy cards for the following food allergies are provided -
Gluten Allergy (Coeliac, Celiac, GF, Gluten)
Nut Allergy
Tree nut Allergy
Celery Allergy
Fish Allergy
Dairy Allergy (Lactose Allergy)
Lupin Allergy
Molluscs Allergy (Shellfish Allergy)
Mustard Allergy
Sesame Allergy
Soya Allergy
Sulphides / Sulfides Allergy
Crustaceans Allergy
Eggs Allergy


This app stores no personal data and has the smallest permissions possible (storage for downloading cards).

Eat Safely, throughout the world.
summary: Eat safely throughout the world with food allergy cards in 190 countries.
recentChanges:
Added Drag and Drop functionality
New card layout
Some small bug fixes
Some big bug fixes
Gaped the spark plugs
comments: Great app to take the stress out of travelling with coeliac. Some feed back. Can we have the ability to lock the selected cards, I find I keep inadvertantly deleting them. USA flag on English version... Really?

Terrible...I downloaded and paid for the app to prevent any issues while traveling in Europe. Portuguese and Italian servers asked who did the translation. They understood the allergy so I guess there's that but I would highly recommend you go with a different app.
Great app, love the ability to download and share cards
This particular app was well thought out and so l bought the pro version without a second thought. l like it a lot

Edit: Taken directly from the app description. "Gluten Allergy (Coeliac, Celiac, GF, Gluten or Wheat Allergy)". A gluten allergy is not a wheat allergy. Products can be gluten free but contain wheat. This is a dangerous description. I downloaded this because I travel regularly and have a wheat allergy. Shoving wheat (and believing this to be the same as a gluten allergy or coeliac disease) in with gluten shows a fundamental misunderstanding of the condition. Worrying in an allergy card app.

title: Allergic Reactions Home Remedy
description: Allergies are a common cause of illness and can occur at any stage in someone's life. Numerous different things cause allergies from pollen to food to medication, meaning it is not always easy to know the best treatments or home remedies.

title: Biteappy: Allergy Diet Eating
description:
‚ÄòBiteappy‚Äô is the app for people with dietary intolerances and allergies who want to search for and locate suitable eateries and restaurants in their area ‚Äì on a worldwide basis.

With such a large range of food allergies, intolerances and special dietary requirements across the world, it can be almost impossible for people to find a restaurant, eatery or bar to cater for their diet or allergy.

Whether you are a vegan with gluten intolerance or someone following a strict kosher diet that wants to avoid MSG, Biteappy will allow you to search for and find the restaurant you need to cater for your dietary needs in just a few taps!
No more searching the Internet and calling restaurants to make sure they cater for your special diet or food allergy.

ALL DIETARY ALLERGIES & INTOLERANCES

Biteappy is the first and only worldwide app to comprehensively address the entire plethora of dietary issues and allergies including gluten free for coeliac, dairy free if you are lactose intolerant, nut free, MSG free, preservative free and other more specific ingredient-free requirements, such as celery or mustard.

The app caters for all special dietary requirements including Vegan, Vegetarian, Paleo, Gluten Free Kosher and Halal.

Don‚Äôt worry if you suffer from multiple food allergies and intolerances our search engine will allow you to select as many as you like no matter what your special diet requirements are.

HOW IT WORKS

1) Login in with Facebook/ Google + or a simple email
2) Users select their specific dietary and cuisine criteria and then search for suitable restaurants in their vicinity, wherever they are in the world.
3) Bite happy with ‚ÄòBiteappy‚Äô

TRANSLATIONS

The app also offers simple translations in over 25 languages, so when abroad it can help users communicate their requirements more easily.

ADDED FEATURES

‚ÄòBiteappy‚Äô also offers a number of added features including:
- Saving your favourites with the click of a heart button
- Keep your preferred dietary preferences saved in Profile for nearby searches - Contribute to the ‚ÄòBiteappy‚Äô community by allowing users to add restaurants to the ‚ÄòBiteappy‚Äô database.
- Provide and share feedback and reviews on places visited for others to benefit from.
- Recipes: view an array of gluten free, dairy free, lactose free, vegan, vegetarian recipes and cook along with us.

Don‚Äôt forget to check out our website to use the service to find the right restaurant for your own specific diet through your browser at www.biteappy.com

Follow us on Twitter: @Biteappy
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/biteappy

comments: Biteappy is life saver for allergy sufferers like us. What I like about the app is I can select tags and it will only show those restaurants. I hope they include more information on speciality restaurants.

App does not work, I was trying to use this app, I got an error messages that said "could not load your tags" I do not understand what this means. I should not have to register or login to use this app.
The applications works great. I think people have issues with their settings. Mine on the s8 works first time. Really helpful app. Give the girl credit, it's a free app covering the world!
The description says it finds restaurants of all allergy types. Mine results were smoking hangouts. Uhh
I'm trying for days, but nothing is happening. Not happy at all.

title: Medgic - Scan, Analyze and Detect Skin Problems
description:
Medgic‚Äôs proprietary Artificial Intelligence (AI) algorithms allow scanning, detection and analysis* of your skin on mobile phones in THREE SIMPLE STEPS:
 
1)     Use Medgic AI camera to take a photo of your skin condition or disease
2)     Medgic AI brain will analyse.. No humans involved!
3)     Medgic will tell you the results*, along with some friendly advices*
 
FEATURES*
- Camera to capture skin photographs and images
- To detect, appraise and check for dermatological disease or conditions
- To analyze skin health and test for any dryness or inflammation
- To scan, evaluate and recognize any skin problems
- To suggest friendly advices for general good health, fitness and healthy lifestyle
 
EXAMPLES OF CONDITIONS*
- Inspect, spot and scan for healthy, beautiful or unhealthy skin
- Review, investigate and examine for smooth or saggy, bad and dry skin
- Analysis, study and evaluation of unknown skin for any of the following common dermatological cutaneous problems or diseases (allergies, allergy, lump, bump, lesion, discoloration, darkening, pigmentation, sun burn, solar damage, erythema, eczema, dermatitis, skin aging, cancer, squamous cell carcinoma, basal cell carcinoma, melanoma, atopic dermatitis, seborrheic keratosis, acne, zit, pimple, black head, white head, rosacea, acne vulgaris, comedone, scarring, scar, wrinkle, ulcer, tumor, pressure sore, ringworm, fungus, larva migrans, bite, spider vein, telangiectasia, striae, stretch mark, mole, nevus, nevi, vitiligo, liver spot, melasma, dark or pigmented spot, bruising, hemangioma, purpura, psoriasis, callus and corn, abscess, boil, carbuncle, furuncle, folliculitis, tinea, keloid, xerosis, wart, itchy skin, pruritus, wheal, urticaria, blister, cold sore, skin tag, cyst, lipoma, ganglion, fibroma, tophi and other joint swellings.)
 
*PLEASE NOTE THAT MEDGIC IS NOT:
(see complete policy: https://medgic.co/en/tap?tab=tou)
- A diagnostic medical device or investigation. It cannot diagnose or perform health screening and checkup. It does not offer diagnosis, histology, dermatoscopy, biopsy or other confirmatory services
- A replacement or substitution for consultation with a doctor, licensed physician or qualified health care professional. It cannot provide second opinions and formal medical examination, consult and guidance
- A therapeutic or management guide. It cannot offer treatment or dispense medications or creams
- A dermatologist, dermatology clinic, dermatology book, resource or hospital
- An emergency service
- A referral for derm medics or skin specialists
- An AI doctor or robot physician. It cannot determine the final diagnosis and cannot treat humans
- An appropriate appraisal tool for hair, nail and general health
- Guaranteed to provide 100% accurate results
 
MISSION:
We hope our AI technology can be deployed to the real world one day to benefit mankind, but we are still a work in progress! Please rate us positively so that we can keep improving!
 
--------------
 
We are always happy to hear from you, do reach out to us at: hello@medgic.co  

Follow us on https://www.facebook.com/medgic.co or https://www.instagram.com/medgic.co/
 
Website: https://www.medgic.co
 
Terms of Use: https://medgic.co/en/tap?tab=tou
Privacy Policy: https://medgic.co/en/tap?tab=pp 
FAQ: https://medgic.co/en/faq

This is highly recommend, it actually analyze what is your skin problem in as easy step as 123. Like, it allow any others to check their skin. Great app!

Useless. The photo analysis is about as accurate as a blind and deaf archer. Every result is radically different to the photo taken. This app is useless. I feel like submitting a photo of an orange and seeing what it thinks that is.
it my first time to download and use this kind of app, so far it is good and useful serves its purpose in analyzing skin health/disease i'm recommending this to my friends and family too! :)

Honestly, I had doubts about the app but when I tried I loved it. The app gave me a correct diagnosis of the skin condition I had and I used the same app to check my niece and I was wowed again by the diagnosis which was again correct. I highly recommend this app.

title: mySymptoms Food Diary & Symptom Tracker
description:
Record, track, and analyze your food, mood, and symptoms to gain insights into your digestive health. 

mySymptoms makes logging a food and symptom diary easy - remembering your favorite foods and providing customizable symptoms. The diary analysis reveals any patterns that emerge between your diet and symptoms. Print a PDF (Android 4.4 or above) / web report of your diary/journal.


DIARY / JOURNAL

‚Ä¢ Record food, drink, medication, stress, exercise, environmental factors, and other activities and notes 
‚Ä¢ Record any symptoms you experience (including intensity, duration, and notes) 
‚Ä¢ Record your energy, sleep quality, and bowel movements (using Bristol scale)
‚Ä¢ View and modify your diary entries 
‚Ä¢ Create and modify your own symptoms 
‚Ä¢ Export your food diary as a PDF (Android 4.4 or above), CSV, or Web report for printing or sharing


INSIGHTS

‚Ä¢ Discover any patterns between your diet and symptoms
‚Ä¢ View suspect foods, trends, and correlations between food and symptoms
‚Ä¢ Configurable analysis
‚Ä¢ Detailed results for each item including histogram and trend chart 


ORGANIZER 

‚Ä¢ Add or modify your own drinks, foods, medications, exercises, and other activities 
‚Ä¢ Add or modify meals with your own ingredients 
‚Ä¢ Add or modify detailed ingredients to any item ‚Äì food, drink or medication 


HOW TO USE

‚Ä¢ Simply begin by tracking your meals along with any symptoms you experience
‚Ä¢ Over time, the more you track, the more the analysis algorithms have to work with to provide any insights


mySymptoms is used by sufferers of:

‚Ä¢ IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
‚Ä¢ IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
‚Ä¢ Food intolerance and sensitivities such as dairy, gluten, lactose
‚Ä¢ Acid reflux
‚Ä¢ Crohn‚Äôs disease
‚Ä¢ Celiac disease
‚Ä¢ SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
‚Ä¢ Ulcerative colitis
‚Ä¢ Migraines & cluster headaches
‚Ä¢ Eczema
‚Ä¢ Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions 

mySymptoms is also useful for recording a FODMAP diet.


Please note that the analysis algorithms use statistical methods to identify suspect foods/items and do not understand your diet or specific health circumstances. 


The information provided by this app is not medical advice. Always consult a doctor if you have any concerns about your health. Always consult a licensed health professional prior to modifying your diet.


mySymptoms also provides a list of common symptoms for food intolerance, IBS, IBD and Crohn's, but you can add extra symptoms as required.


Terms: http://mysymptoms.net/terms


NOTE: mySymptoms Food Diary currently supports portrait orientation only.


SUPPORT

If you experience any issues with mySymptoms, then please contact our support team - we will do our utmost to resolve the issue as soon as possible. Thanks!

support@skygazerlabs.com

MORE INFORMATION

Web: www.mysymptoms.net
Twitter: twitter.com/mysymptoms
Facebook: fb.me/mySymptoms
Enquiries: hello@mysymptoms.net

comments: I think this is a very well designed app and very user friendly. I love the fact that I can email her a full report of my days, from supplements to medications to exercise to reactions but some times I have questions and symptoms unrelated to any of the categories and a notes category would make it 5 stars plus! Very easy to use, well designed app
Works great for my celiac needs to log food entry and bowel movements but wish it would allow blood sugar results too. It's hard to find an app that does both.

Good app for entering your data (what you eat, how much and when), but the Analysis algorithm needs some work!! Not easy to comprehend, and I dont think I have problems with sweet potatoes, despite what it says.

title: Food Allergy Support
description:
MyFoodAllergyTeam is a social network and support group for those living with food allergies. Get the emotional support you need from others like you, get practical tips to manage your life with food allergies, and insights about treatment or therapies. MyFoodAllergyTeam is the only social network where you can truly connect, make real friendships, and share daily ups and downs in a judgment-free place.

-Keep up and follow members photos & updates
-Quick photo buttons so you don't miss a beat 
-Post updates about the daily ups & downs 
-Get/Give instant hugs, likes & comments of support 
-Search the Q+A section/ask and answer questions 
-Add others to your team 
-Find others near you and like you
-Add your diagnosis and view others

MyFoodAllergyTeam is for those living with food allergies.


We welcome your feedback! 
Please email us at support@myfoodallergyteam.com with your comments & suggestions.

title: Sensio Air, Pollen & Pollution, allergy tracker
description:
Sensio Air Allergy & Pollen Tracker
Learn your symptoms‚Äô causes

Quickly discover what is causing your allergy and asthma symptoms. Sensio Air is the best allergy and pollen tracker app for logging your symptoms and learning what is triggering your issues.  

The Sensio allergy tracker allows you to monitor thousands of common allergens, including molds, pollens, pet dander, air pollutants and more. 

With our simple, intuitive interface, you can track your daily allergy symptoms, monitor potential allergens and receive pollen and air pollution alerts in your local area. Advice from experts then helps you learn how to combat and eliminate the sources of your allergy and asthma symptoms such as hay fever, runny nose, headache and shortness of breath.

Sensio Air has air quality monitors in 320 cities around the world that provide a local pollen count and smog forecast.

Sensio AIR helps you keep track of your air quality and your respiratory symptoms by using smart algorithms to understand your triggers.

‚Ä¢ Check the daily local pollution and pollen index for your area along with 320 major metropolitan areas around the world. 
‚Ä¢ Log your symptoms with the tap of a button to keep track of your health.
‚Ä¢ Get daily advice to improve your health and reduce your exposure to allergens and pollutants.
‚Ä¢ Get local pollen, pollution and air quality alerts and know exactly what to do about them.

Learning more about what may be causing your symptoms will help you identify which remedies such as Allegra, Claritin, Zyrtec, or other options could best alleviate your or your family‚Äôs health issues.

We work hard to improve the app and always appreciate your feedback.

Monitor, Understand, Log and Prevent your symptoms!

For more information, please visit www.sensioair.com

Don't hesitate to send feedback to support@sensioair.com

With our simple, intuitive interface, you can track your daily allergy symptoms, monitor potential allergens and receive pollen and air pollution alerts in your local area. Advice from experts then helps you learn how to combat and eliminate the sources of your allergy and asthma symptoms such as hay fever, runny nose, headache and shortness of breath.

Sensio Air has air quality monitors in 320 cities around the world that provide a local pollen count and smog forecast.

Sensio AIR helps you keep track of your air quality and your respiratory symptoms by using smart algorithms to understand your triggers.

‚Ä¢ Check the daily local pollution and pollen index for your area along with 320 major metropolitan areas around the world.
‚Ä¢ Log your symptoms with the tap of a button to keep track of your health.
‚Ä¢ Get daily advice to improve your health and reduce your exposure to allergens and pollutants.
‚Ä¢ Get local pollen, pollution and air quality alerts and know exactly what to do about them.

Learning more about what may be causing your symptoms will help you identify which remedies such as Allegra, Claritin, Zyrtec, or other options could best alleviate your or your family‚Äôs health issues.

We work hard to improve the app and always appreciate your feedback.

Monitor, Understand, Log and Prevent your symptoms!

For more information, please visit www.sensioair.com

Don't hesitate to send feedback to support@sensioair.com
summary: Learn what‚Äôs causing your allergies with Sensio allergen and symptom tracker.

Added new health information questionnaire to help us understand better your symptom causes.
Integrated new notification design.
Fixed minor forecast bug.
comments: I live about 100kl from Brisbane the nearest area given.Does not give enough detail for allergies.This app is super easy to use,BUT it is at this moment 3 DAYS behind YYY .

I counted on this app to help me adjust my medications, and now I've lost my voice because of allergy symptoms. At first I didn't understand why, but after I compared Sensio's forecasts with those from other allergy tracking sources in my area, I found out that Sensio had been saying allergens were very low, when they weren't. Don't count on this app.

Useless and inaccurate, unfortunately. The app is intended to work with the (generally unavailable) monitoring devices sold by the company, but it seems to be linked to a monitor next to a coal furnace, since it 's always indicating dangerously high levels of particulate pollution.

The idea is benefecial but there is a problem with Lebanon for example. The application gives a number of choices (Beirut, horsh, kaslik, ...) but they have been the same numbers and description for 3 days. No update for Lebanon, why is it included then? I checked for 2 European and North American cities and the info has been daily updated. Another issue, there is Israel with its capital Jerusalem! No other neighboring Arab states: Egypt, Jordan, Palestine... except UAE.

This app is wonderful. I only gave 4 stars because I wish it was a bit more detailed, as in what kind of tree pollen and the individual levels for each tree being pick up in the air so I can better determine which one is triggering my symptoms.

title: Allergy Smart Shopper Pro
description:
If you buy groceries for people with allergies, and you've ever spent hours in the grocery store trying to read ingredient labels and decide which products are safe to buy, then Allergy Smart Shopper is the perfect app for you! This app takes the hassle out of grocery shopping by helping you keep track of allergies and alerting you if certain products might not be safe to buy. 

* This is the PRO version of our "Allergy Smart Shopper Free". Feel free to try before you buy!

Key Features:
* Allergy Tracking: Create lists of people and their allergies so you don't have to remember them all.
* Barcode Scanning: Scan product barcodes to see what ingredients they contain.
* Intelligent Analysis: Automatically cross-reference the ingredients in the products you scan with the allergy lists you create and determine if any ingredient poses an allergy risk.

Note about our databases:
We are releasing this app with a limited product database for now. Product databases are very expensive to purchase and maintain, so we are relying on a combination of freely-available data sources for the first few releases. As a result, some people may find that this app successfully finds most of the products they scan, while others may not. If you find a barcode that is not supported by our database (you will see a "Product Not Found" message), please use the "Tell Us" button that the app presents to let us know about it. We will do our best to try and add every product that you tell us is missing!

title: My Food Intolerance List
description:
Do you suffer from lactose, fructose, histamine, gluten, sorbitol or salicylic acid intolerance? Or do you even have several of them? No problem! With ALL i CAN EAT you have all your food intolerances under control.

ALL i CAN EAT adjusts to your individual intolerances and calculates your compatibility for each food. The compatibilities are displayed in a simple traffic light system, ranging from green (very well tolerated) to yellow and orange up to red (bad idea to eat). If a recommendation does not apply to you, you can easily save your individual tolerance for the food concerned.

Search quickly for a specific food, browse certain categories such as beverages, fruits, dairy products, etc. or filter compatibilites by color. In addition, ALL i CAN EAT does also provide many details such as the amounts of lactose, fructose, glucose, histamine, sorbitol, salicylic acid, amines, amino acids, etc. And in case you should miss a food, you can add it easily.

You will never have to search various lists again or learn any numbers by heart! With ALL i CAN EAT you manage all your food intolerances in one place.

I wish that in addition to gluten and histamine I could add other things like cow's milk (A1 dairy) and maybe a few other things like cashews, Brazil nuts, ginger... but definitely pleasantly surprised to see detailed information on certain amino acids, etc. hopefully it is correct

Limited food selection. For example, acorn squash not listed. Grey color coding not explained. Would not use as definitive guide. Last updated over 2 years ago.
So easy to use and so many different types of food listed. My very favorite app to use for food sensitivities!

title: Baby Food & Allergy Tracker
description:
The Baby Food & Allergy Tracker can help you track the foods your little one loves, and the ones they don't!

- Type in the name of the food
- Record their reaction: like, dislike or neutral
- Tick whether it gave them an allergic reaction
- All stored in an easy-to-read dashboard, ordered by date

If your child has food allergies, the most effective way to deal with them is to avoid foods that trigger symptoms. This can be tricky, though - so why not track and record their preferences with the Baby Food & Allergy Tracker app.

title: Infood - Ingredients food scanner
description:
Do you know what‚Äôs in your food?
Are you a vegan or vegetarian? Do you eat lactose free, gluten free or look for a clean label or just trans fat free.

Infood app will help you decide if a given food is suitable for you or not, based on your personal preferences.
Reading labels all the time may be annoying and exhausting, let us do it for you.

Follow us on Facebook, share your experience and feature requests:
https://www.facebook.com/infoodapp.net or emails us at info@infoodapp.net
You can also visit our website https://infoodapp.net/

You can choose among our premium filters: Vegan, Vegetarian, Clean Label, Lactose free Gluten free and Trans fat. You can combine them with specific ingredients that you would like to avoid.
Just scan the product's barcode and Infood app will let you know if any of the ingredients you configured is found on the label.

If a product is not found in our database you can easily add it.
Just take a picture of the ingredients, Infood app will automatically extract the ingredients from the picture. Always check and correct the ingredients text.

You can add ingredients in many languages, Infood app will detect the language.
For travelers who want to know what they eat, In food will translate the ingredients in food.

If possible always add ingredients in English. This will help us provide you with more accurate results.
The app is flexible and may be used to scan foods if you have allergies or food intolerance (Gluten free, Lactose free), for healthy eating (Clean label, Trans fat), when following different diets like Vegan or Vegetarian.

Our new Vegan ingredients scanner, Vegetarian ingredients scanner, Gluten free ingredients scanner, Lactose free ingredients scanner, Trans fat ingredients scanner and Clean label ingredients scanner will be soon extended to include more diets and lifestyles.
We strongly stay behind the clean food idea, our Clean label food scanner is a must for healthy eating.
You can choose also trans fat free eating, sugar free foods, no preservatives, no colorants, no E numbers, no food additives and many other combinations

Easy to use and very helpful!

So far this app is great and helpful. I would like an option to pay for premium and remove ads and either an option to scan the front of a product so you don't have to pick up something in the store and/or a shortcut for search in the homepage of the app.

title: Hay Fever Allergy
description: Allergic rhinitis, also known as hay fever, is a type of inflammation in the nose which occurs when the immune system overreacts to allergens in the air. Signs and symptoms include a runny or stuffy nose, sneezing, red, itchy, and watery eyes, and swelling around the eyes. The fluid from the nose is usually clear. Symptom onset is often within minutes following exposure and they can affect sleep, the ability to work, and the ability to concentrate at school. Those whose symptoms are due to pollen typically develop symptoms during specific times of the year. Many people with allergic rhinitis also have asthma, allergic conjunctivitis, or atopic dermatitis.

Those whose symptoms are due to pollen typically develop symptoms during specific times of the year. Many people with allergic rhinitis also have asthma, allergic conjunctivitis, or atopic dermatitis.
summary: Hay fever is type of inflammation in the nose which occurs.

title: Allergy Eye Drops
description:
"Allergy eyedrops are liquid medicines used to treat symptoms of eye allergies. Eye allergy symptoms include:

A burning feeling in your eye
Feeling like something is in the eye
Itchy eyes
Red (bloodshot) eyes
Swollen eyelid
Tearing
An eye allergy can be triggered by the same things that cause hay fever, such as:
Pollen 
Dust
Pet dander
Certain medications or contact lenses can also be triggers.
Types of Allergy Eyedrops
Your doctor may first suggest you take these steps:
Use artificial tears.
Place a cold cloth on the eyes.
Avoid your allergy triggers.
Which type of allergy eyedrop you use depends on:
The cause of your allergy
Your symptoms
How much the symptoms affect your daily activities

There are many types of allergy eyedrops. Not all treat all allergy symptoms. For example, one that relieves red eyes may not stop the itching.
Some are sold over the counter. For others you need a prescription from a doctor. Some relieve symptoms quickly. Others provide long-term relief.
"

title: Allergic Reaction Treatment And Symptoms
description:
Allergies are hypersensitive responses from the immune system to substances that either enter or come into contact with the body. These substances are known as allergens, and when your body reacts to them, it causes an allergic reaction.

These substances commonly include materials such as pet dander, pollen, or bee venom. Anything can be an allergen if the immune system has an adverse reaction.

A substance that causes an allergic reaction is called an allergen. Allergens can be found in food, drinks, or the environment.

Many allergens are harmless and do not affect most people.

If a person is allergic to a substance, such as pollen, their immune system reacts to the substance as if it was foreign and harmful, and tries to destroy it.

The symptoms of an allergic reaction can vary from mild to severe. If you become exposed to an allergen for the first time, your symptoms may be mild. These symptoms may get worse if you repeatedly come into contact with the allergen.

For allergy sufferers, the best treatment is to avoid the offending allergens altogether. This may be possible if the allergen is a specific food, like peanuts, which can be cut out of the diet, but not when the very air we breathe is loaded with allergens, such as ragweed pollen. Various over-the-counter or prescription medications can relieve symptoms.

- Antihistamines. These medications counter the effects of histamine, the substance that makes eyes water and noses itch and causes sneezing during allergic reactions. Sleepiness was a problem with the oldest antihistamines, but the newest drugs do not cause such a problem.

- Nasal steroids. These anti-inflammatory sprays help decrease inflammation, swelling, and mucus production. They work well alone and, for some people, in combination with antihistamines; in recommended doses, they are relatively free of side effects.

- Cromolyn sodium. A nasal spray, cromolyn sodium can help stop hay fever, perhaps by blocking release of histamine and other symptom-producing chemicals. It has few side effects.

- Decongestants. Available in capsule and spray form, decongestants may reduce swelling and sinus discomfort. Intended for short-term use, they are usually used in combination with antihistamines. Long-term usage of spray decongestants can actually make symptoms worse, while decongestant pills do not have this problem.

- Immunotherapy. Immunotherapy (allergy shots) might provide relief for patients who don't find relief with antihistamines or nasal steroids. Allergy shots alter the body's immune response to allergens, thereby helping to prevent allergic reactions. They are the only form of treatment that can induce long-lasting protection for several years after therapy is stopped. Current immunotherapy treatments are limited because of potential allergic reactions; rarely, these can be severe.

Download this Allergic Reaction Treatment And Symptoms app now for get more info.

title: TOTAAL - Asthma and Allergies
description:
Tropical Outdoor Triggers of Asthma and Allergies (TOTAAL ) application is a free app that provides de levels of pollen and fungal spores for the benefit of allergy sufferers. TOTAAL app is for individual with allergies specifically fungal spores that triggers allergies of the eyes (allergic conjunctivitis), the nose (allergic rhinitis), the skin (atopic dermatitis/eczema and or hives) and those with asthma. This app will help you correlate your allergies and asthma with the local fungal counts.
 
TOTAAL app allows you to see real pollen and fungal spore counts in San Juan, PR. TOTAAL app has been developed by Dr. Benjamin Bola√±os, Director an d founder of the San Juan, PR AAAAI Station of the Medical Sciences Campus, of the University of Puerto Rico. . Dr. Bola√±os is an Associate Professor of the Department of Microbiology of the Medical Sciences Campus, University of Puerto Rico. He has been involved in clinical studies on the role of fungal spores as allergens and purification of tropical fungal allergens. 

Any use of this information provided by the app is for personal use only.
 
The TOTAAL app are the property of the San Juan Station of the Medical Sciences Campus. Any use, copying, reproducing or re-publishing of these these materials is prohibited without the prior written approval of Benjamin Bola√±os and the Medical Sciences Campus, University of Puerto Rico.

title: Home Remedy for Allergy
description:
Signs and Symptoms
There are various kinds of allergies, which are caused by different allergens and therefore, the symptoms of different allergies are different. However, some of the common symptoms are:
Sneezing
Sinus or migraine pain
Runny nose
Coughing
Hives
Puffiness or swelling
Itching in  eyes, ears, throat, lips, and palate
Fever
Vomiting
ÔÇß	Diarrhoea
ÔÇß	Redness in eyes
ÔÇß	Outright attack of asthma
ÔÇß	Rashes
ÔÇß	Bloating
ÔÇß	Abdominal pain
Tips for Preventing Allergies
1. Curtail Untidiness : Minimize extra clutter from your house, which augments dust and dirt, like old books, dried flowers, old soft toys, etc.
2. Make your Bed a Bug-free Domain : 
4. Air-conditioner : Always use an air conditioner in the car while driving, as it filters the fresh air and keeps the dirt away. 
5. Avoid Smoking : Smoking is the most dangerous thing that can worsen the allergies, and if the allergic person has a habit of smoking, it is fatal for him/her. Avoid smoking to reduce the allergic reactions.
6. Set up an Air Filter at Home : .
7. Segregate your Pets :  Remember to wash your hands, every time, you touch them.
8. Rinse with Saline Water Before Allergy Symptoms Wallop :
9. Consume Fish Oil Supplements : Fish oil supplements are an effective remedy for curing the asthmatic allergies. It helps in restricting the level of leukotrienes in the body, which otherwise contributes in increasing the allergy.
Note- Some people are allergic to fish oil supplements and cod liver oil. Identify the kind of allergy you have and consult a doctor before applying this remedy.
10. Don‚Äôt Step Out Uncovered : Do not step out of the house without wearing a sunscreen and glasses. Try to avoid direct exposure to sun rays, as much as possible.
11. Try Butterbur : Butterbur is the best natural remedy to cure pollen allergies. It is also a helpful remedy in restraining the problems of asthma, and migraine pain.
12. Acupuncture : It is assumed that acupuncture also plays a vital role in curbing down the allergic reactions. It is also helpful in preventing hay fever.
13. Consume Turmeric : The anti-bacterial properties of turmeric help to curb the allergens in the body. Additionally, it also strengthens the immune system and ward off cold. Turmeric should be an essential ingredient in the daily diet of a person.
It can also be consumed by mixing half tablespoon of turmeric powder in a glass of hot milk.
14. Honey : Consuming a spoon of pure honey every day proves to be helpful in curbing down the allergic reactions, especially the one, caused by pollens.
15. HEPA Filters : Make sure that your vacuum cleaners are equipped with HEPA filters that are very efficient in trapping the microbes fast. However, HEPA filters, if installed in the entire house, are generally more effective.
16. Steam : Steam bathing is the best way to open the stuffy nose, caused by allergies. It also soothes the irritation in the throat. This is also effective in curing clogged ear allergies.
17. Eucalyptus Oil : This essential oil, extracted out of the leaves of eucalyptus, is an excellent remedy to cure blocked nasal passages, sinus, and other allergic reactions.
18. Spicy Food : Some people believe that eating spicy foods, like wasabi, chilli peppers, fresh garlic, Dijon mustard, and horseradish clears the troubling effects, caused by sinus.  The piquant effect also clears the blocked nasal passage.
19. Nettle Leaves : Nettle leaves are the natural source of antihistamine. It can be taken in the form of tea, tincture or capsule. 
20. Quercetin : 
Here are some effective home remedies for curing bad allergies.
1. Histamine 
2. Natrum mur 
3. Kali bich
4. Justicia adhatoda
5. Hepar sulph
6. Carbo veg 
7. Sulphur.
8. Bryonia
9. Nux vom
10. Apis mel
11. Ailanthus
12. Dulcamara
13. Arsenic album
14. Sepia
15. Argentum nit
16. Tellurium
17. Thuja

We are not Doctor we don't cure allergy these are just suggestion, consult your physician before any intake:
Thanks

Allergic can come from many sources, such as food and animals. Try out this audio book to learn what you need to know about allergies!

title: Asthma and Allergies Risk Assessment
description:
Allergies are about your immune system. Millions of people have Asthma. Allergic asthma is the most common type, affecting around 60% of people.

Shortness of breath and wheezing are visual indications of asthma. Allergies trigger the Asthma symptoms.

Typical symptoms of Asthma are chest tightness, moodiness, tired feeling, exercise are also assessed. Lung function is also assessed as early symptom for Asthma.

Other aspects like anxiety, early awakening, fast heart rate, and pulse are assessed as part of the diagnosis.

It's your life and health. So, be proactive.

title: Antibiotics - Guide
description:
Antibiotics , also called antibacterials, are a type of antimicrobial drug used in the treatment and prevention of bacterial infections.

They may either kill or inhibit the growth of bacteria. A limited number of antibiotics also possess antiprotozoal activity. 

Antibiotics & Infections is an app designed to meet the needs of medical students and health-care providers regarding anti-bacterial agents and their use in bacterial infections.
They may either kill or inhibit the growth of bacteria. 

A limited number of antibiotics also possess antiprotozoal activity.  Antibiotics are not effective against viruses such as the common cold or influenza; drugs which inhibit viruses are termed antiviral drugs or antivirals rather than antibiotics.

The Antibiotics includes guidance for central nervous system, dental, genital tract, gastro-intestinal, HIV, immunocompromised, lower respiratory tract, skin/ soft tissue, tropical, upper respiratory tract and urinary tract infections in adults and children. Doses, frequencies, durations of treatment, first-line, second-line and penicillin allergic options are included.

App should prove invaluable to all general practitioners, physicians, junior doctors, nurses, pharmacists, other medical staff and healthcare professionals working within primary care.

Antibiotic is an agent that weakens or destroys bacteria; antibiotics are medically used to treat various types of bacterial infections. The various types of antibiotics work either by preventing an infection from growing or by destroying an existing infection. Antibiotics are produced either from a mold or a fungus or are produced synthetically.

Aminoglycosides work by interfering with the protein formation of bacteria. Aminoglycosides include gentamicin, amikacin, and tobramycin. Side effects can include damage to the nerves of hearing and balance, as well as kidney injury.



* Topic Covers in App:

- Treatment Guidelines
- Restricted Antibiotics
- Penicillin Allergy
- Common pathogens
- The first line antibiotics
- Alternatives
- with their dosages and durations.



NOTE: The information in this antibiotics application is intended to provide general medical information, it is not a substitute for the expertise and judgment of your healthcare providers. You should consult your health care professional before taking any drugs.

title: Bearable - Symptoms & Mood tracker
description:
‚úÖ All health tracking in one place

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your health professional can get the full picture.

‚úÖ Reclaim control over your well-being

Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible to all. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on getting better.  

The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues.

‚úÖ Gain useful insights with just a few clicks a day

With just a few simple clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health.


Bearable helps you to:

‚úîÔ∏è Record your mood and symptoms in seconds, or go into more detail with an additional note. 
‚úîÔ∏è Fully customise your daily activities and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise and medication/supplements. 
‚úîÔ∏è Gain insights into how your daily activities and health factors impact your mood and symptoms using our graphs, calendar and stats pages.
‚úîÔ∏è Keep everything in one place with our neat health timeline, so that you can get the full picture. Use our search function to filter just what you want to see or show your health professional.
‚úîÔ∏è Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment - no need to struggle to remember a detailed health timeline for the last week or month.
‚úîÔ∏è Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick, simple and enjoyable entry process.

And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶

‚ûï Set Reminders - Fully customise your reminders, whether it's a general reminder to make a diary entry or a reminder to take your medication and supplements. 
‚ûï Share and Export -  Export data securely to yourself or your health professional
‚ûï Automatic health data sync - You can choose to allow the app to automatically gather data such as Sleep and Steps taken from your phone.
‚ûï Dark mode - Change at night to a display easier on the eyes.
‚ûï Restore data across devices - Restore your data between Apple & Android devices.


üîê PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time.  It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.


üíü MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with mental and physical health issues themselves.  With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD.  Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most.  We are committed to continue improving upon this app that could help many people start to feel like they can reclaim control over their health.  If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them over to james@bearable.app.  We‚Äôd love to hear from you.

comments: This is absolutely the best of its kind. I have never seen such a comprehensive, customizable, well-designed app that serves as many functions as this one. I've already shown it to multiple friends/therapists. For those of you moaning about the cost... seriously, getting the subscription will set you back just over $2/month. I work professionally with highly impoverished individuals who do have to count every penny, but come on. Most people can shell out a couple bucks without harm.

The app lets you log your mood, any symptoms you are having, and a number of factors that you think may be affecting your mood/symptoms. The default categories to log are good, but you can add/remove/edit all of the categories to fit you better. It's super easy to fill out, even when I'm not feeling well. It (sometimes) feels like I'm logging meaningless information, but then when I click on the Insights tab, it shows me tons of relevant information about which factors are influencing my mood (or any other symptom I log!). Turns out listening to music and video chats work wonders for my mood--good to know! This is also a wonderful way to record how I'm feeling over time--it lets me easily decipher long-term changes in my wellbeing, which is great information to discuss with medical professionals.

I really like this app, it's easy to use and the design is nice and the ability to customize it to your needs is great. However, the syncing isn't very reliable. I have a phone and a tablet, and downloaded it on both, I tried to log in on the tablet, and only a few entries were visible. Later I went to look at the one on my phone, and half the entries are gone, and so are factors I added. I want to keep using this app, but if it's going to randomly forget things that's a problem.

I have tried multiple times in the past to find a way that I could easily log my moods in a way that felt nuanced and meaningful but also flexible and customizable, but this is the first app I have ever seen that got it right. For once, I am finding it convenient to do quick check ins and even monitor my food and water intake which I never thought I'd have the patience to do. You don't have to get premium, but it's well worth it at least to support a great app.

Brilliant App & well worth paying for. I wanted an app to record daily symptoms to enable me to give an accurate report to my GP. This app has everything I wanted & more. Being able to write notes by each symptom is so helpful & the insight reports are incredible. I did have a little snag when I first signed up for the free trial, but I made contact, explained the situation & James helped me to sort it all out. The app has been fantastic ever since. Thank you bearable team üôèüèªü•∞

Second, the format provides low visibility. I was looking for something thst displays data like a calendar with icons and notes to show my doctors an overall picture of my health for each day. This is more like a database that has to be searched by individual criteria. I can't use this app in its current format.
Simple and organized; has a user-friendly interface! A very helpful app!

title: SaniQ Asthma - Lung & Allergy
description:
SaniQ Asthma is your digital health diary with numerous useful features.

In the app you can quickly and easily document everything important about your health: Medical measurements, symptoms & much more. 

The SaniQ Asthma app supports you with daily challenges: It reliably reminds you to take measurements and take medication. You can also manage your medicine in the app.

SaniQ Asthma is a medical device developed, maintained and registered in Germany.

Features

* Documentation of maximum exhalation rate (peak flow), one-second capacity (FEV1), weight & oxygen saturation
* Recording of medical measurements via Bluetooth using compatible measuring devices or by manual input
* Clear graphical & tabular display of measured values
* Creation of a health diary (PDF file) that you can forward to your doctor for analysis and evaluation, for example.
* Individual memory of taking your medication 
* Management of your medicine supply 
* Individual and up-to-date pollen flight information
* Secure storage of therapy documents, findings and emergency plans

Which advantages does SaniQ Asthma offer you?

* Notice earlier deteriorations in the process
* Enable your doctors to plan a sounder & targeted therapy 
* Analyse your measured values and adapt your lifestyle in a targeted way
* Improve your treatment with reliable measurements and drug revenue

SaniQ Asthma is free of advertising!

Compatible Bluetooth measurement devices

* MIR Smart One with Bluetooth (Peak Flow, FEV1)
* Beurer BF710 balance with Bluetooth (weight)
* any measuring instrument without radio connection

This app is registered as a Class 1 medical device according to the German Medical Devices Act. It is registered under the number DE/CA71/21a/07/2.3/2017/0043. SaniQ Asthma thus fulfils the requirements of the 93/42/EEC Directive of the European Union Council on Medical Devices. However, we expressly point out that the use of SaniQ Asthma does not replace a doctor's visit.

If you have any comments or tips on how to improve the app, simply send us an email. The SaniQ team is looking forward to hearing from you.

We wish you lots of fun and always good health with SaniQ!

title: Austin Allergy Alert
description: With Austin Allergy Alert, users can view daily allergen counts specific to Austin, TX, check the 5-day weather forecast, and track the severity of their allergy symptoms using the calendar feature. Users can also choose to receive daily push notifications when the newest allergen counts are published.

title: Baby Product & Allergy Tracker
description:
"The Baby Product & Allergy Tracker can help you track the products your little one loves, and the ones they don't!

- Type in the name of a product
- Record their reaction: like, dislike or neutral
- Tick whether it gave them an allergic reaction
- Save up to three images for each product or reaction
- Share any products to avoid with family or babysitters
- All stored in an easy-to-read dashboard, ordered by date

If your child has product allergies, the most effective way to deal with them is to avoid products that trigger symptoms. This can be tricky, though - so why not track and record their preferences with the Baby Product & Allergy Tracker app."

title: Sleep Hypnosis Allergy Relief
description:
*** SPECIALLY FORMULATED FOR LISTENING AT BEDTIME - UNLOCK THE POWER OF YOUR SUBCONSCIOUS MIND - WHILE YOU SLEEP ***

Wish you could reprogram your mind like software engineers reprogram computers? - NOW YOU CAN!

With our unique self-help MindSoft‚Ñ¢ Sleep Hypnosis recordings you can start making deep internal changes to your life - TODAY!

Start using YOUR brain's full potential. Reclaim a third of your life for self-improvement and personal enrichment by re-programming YOUR mind while you sleep!!

Commit to change. Act today. Effectively and easily transform core inner beliefs and create long lasting changes that dramatically improve the quality of your life!

Whether you suffer from seasonal hay fever or any other form of allergy you may not be aware that there could be some psychological element to it.

This can be especially true if you know that you only developed your allergy later in life and were not born with it.

Another possible clue to an allergy having a psychological aspect is if your allergy worsens during periods of stress, low energy and tiredness.

An allergy can hold you back from living the life you want. The fear of exposure to an allergen can create a prison for you or stop you from pursuing interests etc. that you would otherwise pursue. Someone suffering from an allergy can be paralyzed from fear, unable to do many things they would love to do.

The facts are that allergies affect millions of people each year and can cause them to seek medical help. However, these same medications can sometimes have undesired and problematic side effects.

Allergies are brought on by many mysterious reasons, some of which may never be fully resolved. That is why many times sufferers are unable to find effective relief.

Allergies can have deep emotional or psychological roots that stem from a traumatic experience in our past. If you experienced a traumatic or undesirable event in your life, you may have associated a particular substance that was present at that time with the discomfort you feel now.

In an effort to protect us, our subconscious mind once again triggers similar reactions whenever we are exposed to the substance.

We have all been programmed to believe that our minds and our bodies are two separate things, but the truth is they are not. It is your mind that often controls how your body reacts!

Empower your mind to stop creating false alarms by using this powerful Sleep Hypnosis recording and learn to take control of the real culprit - your subconscious mind.

This method is powerful and effective for any allergy, giving you long term and permanent relief!

Whether you suffer from seasonal hay fever or any other form of allergy you may not be aware that there could be some psychological element to it.

This can be especially true if you know that you only developed your allergy later in life and were not born with it.

Another possible clue to an allergy having a psychological aspect is if your allergy worsens during periods of stress, low energy and tiredness.

An allergy can hold you back from living the life you want. The fear of exposure to an allergen can create a prison for you or stop you from pursuing interests etc. that you would otherwise pursue. Someone suffering from an allergy can be paralyzed from fear, unable to do many things they would love to do.

The facts are that allergies affect millions of people each year and can cause them to seek medical help. However, these same medications can sometimes have undesired and problematic side effects.

Allergies are brought on by many mysterious reasons, some of which may never be fully resolved. That is why many times sufferers are unable to find effective relief.

Allergies can have deep emotional or psychological roots that stem from a traumatic experience in our past. If you experienced a traumatic or undesirable event in your life, you may have associated a particular substance that was present at that time with the discomfort you feel now.

In an effort to protect us, our subconscious mind once again triggers similar reactions whenever we are exposed to the substance.

title: Healthy Pantry Allergies
description:
Get the facts on your food with the NxtNutrio Healthy Pantry, which helps you spot common allergens, artificial ingredients and other chemicals hidden in many brand-name foods. Simply scan a food item‚Äôs barcode to see specific information about its ingredients. Based on your profile settings, you‚Äôll see how each ingredient could possibly affect your health. The easy-to-understand green, yellow and red symbols suggest when it‚Äôs okay to eat an item, when to eat with caution or when to completely avoid an item. You‚Äôll also receive a list of healthier alternatives to the item you scanned.  

The NxtNutrio Healthy Pantry makes it easy to find hidden ingredients, like:

‚Ä¢ Chemicals
‚Ä¢ Genetically Modified Foods

If you‚Äôre trying to make smarter decisions about the food you eat, the NxtNutrio Healthy Pantry app can help you quickly and confidently make informed choices. It‚Äôs label reading simplified to suit your busy lifestyle.

title: Pediatric Allergy & Immunology
description:
A leading pediatric allergy journal is now available on your Android device. ‚ÄúPediatric Allergy and Immunology‚Äù app is the leading source of information on the understanding and treatment of immune deficiency and allergic inflammatory and infectious diseases in children. Enjoy an entirely new browsing and reading experience, and keep up to date with the most important developments in pediatric allergy research even faster:

‚Ä¢ Stay current with the latest articles through Early View
‚Ä¢ Be notified when a new issue is available
‚Ä¢ Download your favourite articles for quick and easy access offline
‚Ä¢ Browse, search and bookmark articles from all available issues
‚Ä¢ Share links to your favourite articles with colleagues and friends

Pediatric Allergy and Immunology, an official journal of the European Academy of Allergy and Clinical Immunology, is the world‚Äôs leading journal in pediatric allergy, publishing original contributions and comprehensive reviews related to the understanding and treatment of immune deficiency and allergic inflammatory and infectious diseases in children. Other areas of interest include:

- development of specific and accessory immunity
- the immunological interaction during pregnancy and lactation between mother and child.

The European Academy of Allergy and Clinical Immunology (EAACI) is an association including 39 European National Societies National Societies, more than 3,500 academicians, research investigators and clinicians aimed at:

- promoting basic and clinical research
- collecting, assessing and disseminating scientific information
- functioning as a scientific reference body for other scientific, health and political organisations
- encouraging and providing training and continuous education
- promoting good patient care in this important area of medicine.

title: Ingredian: Scan Food Labels
description:
If a healthy diet is important to you, then take a moment to look at a few food ingredient labels at your local grocery store. You'll find dangerous additives such as monosodium glutamate (MSG), butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT) and even worse! The U.S. Food and Drug Administration claims these are "generally recognized as safe", however independent research suggests otherwise. But what about the safety of other common additives such as propyl gallate or sodium nitrate? 

Introducing Ingredian, the food scanner. Ingredian uses your phone's camera to scan ingredient label text for quickly detecting additives and other potentially harmful chemicals lurking in your food. All detected ingredients are sorted in order by category with web links that provide additional information about each one. 

Ingredian can also assist in detecting allergens such as eggs, dairy, fish, nuts, soy and wheat.  The Ingredian Pro paid version supports an Alpha-gal diet, i.e., red meat allergy diet. 

This app scans ingredient label text on the product container.  Similar apps scan bar codes, which are frequently out of date or missing entirely from the connected server's database.

Features:
 ¬† ‚úî Ingredient categories: Allergens, Anti-caking agents, Anti-foaming agents, Bleaching agents, Buffering agents, Colorings, Countries of origin, Emulsifiers, Enzymes, Flavorings, Miscellaneous, Nutrients, Oils, Preservatives, Solvents, Spices/Herbs, Stabilizers & Sweeteners
 ¬† ‚úî Diets supported: Dairy-free, Fish-free, Gluten-free, Nut-free, Vegan & Vegetarian
 ¬† ‚úî Performs fast real-time scans - No need to crop a picture and wait for results
 ¬† ‚úî Supports scanning of large labels such as found on frozen pizza boxes
 ¬† ‚úî Ingredients are detected by the device with no server intervention
 ¬† ‚úî Detected ingredients scroll across the screen for quick review
 ¬† ‚úî Detects country of origin when listed on the ingredients label
 ¬† ‚úî Supports customization of detectable ingredients and diets
 ¬† ‚úî Camera Zoom option for setting initial zoom from 0 - 100% 
 ¬† ‚úî Speech Synthesizer option to speak ingredients detected
 ¬† ‚úî Detects over 300 allergens from Abalone to Zucchini
 ¬† ‚úî Web links to food safety gov and nutrition info sites
 ¬† ‚úî Scan Accuracy options: Good, Better & Best 
 ¬† ‚úî Scan Mode options: Automatic & Manual
 ¬† ‚úî Camera Flash option for use in low light
 ¬† ‚úî Unlimited number of scans permitted
 ¬† ‚úî High-contrasting user interface
 ¬† ‚úî Minimal permissions required
 ¬† ‚úî Low power consumption
 ¬† ‚úî Show diet compliancies
 ¬† ‚úî Small download size
 
This app is free with no data tracking and no required user sign-in. Intended only for the U.S.A. and its territories.

Note:  Some older Samsung Galaxy devices have camera autofocus issues that may prevent them from working with this and other Android apps. Click on this link for a possible remedy:
https://removeandreplace.com/2016/06/09/10-reasons-why-a-samsung-galaxy-phone-is-taking-blurry-pictures

Email us for any questions or to request a new database ingredient at CadresSoftware@gmail.com
