title: Allergy displays Pro
description:
- When you travel, or directly when you go out to eat something in your own area, there are usually problems to communicate with the staff of the bars and restaurants to expose your food allergy or intolerance.

- Sometimes, although they may understand you, they do not take the situation as serious as it should be taken, either due to ignorance or pasotism.

- In addition, since 2011 there is a community regulation on consumer information (Regulation number 1169/2011 of the European Parliament) but many bars and restaurants do not apply it and neither do they report allergen products nor do they have taken into account cross-contamination. 

- For these reasons and more, in this app we offer you displays in various languages emphasizing the seriousness of your situation. So that neither language nor ignorance are a barrier in bars and restaurants and they can take into consideration your allergy or intolerance and thus be able to travel quietly.

- We also offer you images of your allergies and intolerances, because many times a picture is worth more than a thousand words.

- Finally, we also put at your disposal the regulations that require bars and restaurants to report allergens so that you have it.

[ This is Pro version of the application. With the Pro version, in addition to having no ads, with that euro you will be supporting me in the development of this app in order to continue improving and adding new languages and content, since it requires a lot of work. Thank you very much! ]

- Any correction or suggestion, please do not hesitate to contact me.
descriptionHTML:
- When you travel, or directly when you go out to eat something in your own area, there are usually problems to communicate with the staff of the bars and restaurants to expose your food allergy or intolerance.

- Sometimes, although they may understand you, they do not take the situation as serious as it should be taken, either due to ignorance or pasotism.

- In addition, since 2011 there is a community regulation on consumer information (Regulation number 1169/2011 of the European Parliament) but many bars and restaurants do not apply it and neither do they report allergen products nor do they have taken into account cross-contamination.

- For these reasons and more, in this app we offer you displays in various languages emphasizing the seriousness of your situation. So that neither language nor ignorance are a barrier in bars and restaurants and they can take into consideration your allergy or intolerance and thus be able to travel quietly.

- We also offer you images of your allergies and intolerances, because many times a picture is worth more than a thousand words.

- Finally, we also put at your disposal the regulations that require bars and restaurants to report allergens so that you have it.

[ This is Pro version of the application. With the Pro version, in addition to having no ads, with that euro you will be supporting me in the development of this app in order to continue improving and adding new languages and content, since it requires a lot of work. Thank you very much! ]

- Any correction or suggestion, please do not hesitate to contact me.
summary: Do you want to travel without your allergies or intolerances as a problem.

title: TAB Street - Allergy Free - Gluten Free
description:
For most people, making a choice to eat out is sometimes just deciding what they are in the mood for, but when you have food allergies that choice becomes a lot harder. Not knowing which restaurant works with your allergy or multiple allergies or even be willing to accommodate. Created with the food allergy user in mind, the site only lists websites that have food allergy, gluten free information available on their websites.

TAB Street is all about empowering everyone, young and old with food allergies, gluten free diet and Celiac Disease. It covers wheat allergy, peanut allergy, dairy allergy soy allergy and much more. No matter the size of the town, from rural areas to the city, every listing that meets the criteria qualifies. This will allow anyone to pull up tabstreet.com at home or on the road and see what is available within 100 miles (location service activate through the website).

The website is growing and there isn't a place or listing in every town but we are always looking for listings that meet the needs and have information on their respective website for food allergies, gluten free and Celiac individuals, their families and friends. The top allergies are covered for each country, USA, Australia, Canada and the United Kingdom.

The website allows for geolocation once it is enabled so what this means for the user, finding a listing that is up to 100 miles/km from where ever you are at, at home or on the road.

No one, young or young at heart, should be excluded from events.

*DISCLAIMER TAB Street LLC is a reference and a guide to helping find listings that have gone the extra mile to include allergy free and/or gluten free information on their website. The Content is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always carry emergency medication and discuss your allergies with the restaurant staff. Always ask the questions that you need to ask to have a safe and enjoyable time.

title: Urticaria
description:
Urticaria is one of the most common diseases of the skin. It is also known under the name of hives or nettle rash. Approximately one in four people gets urticaria in the course of her or his life. Urticaria is characterized by the sudden onset of itchy wheals and/or angioedema. The skin of the entire body or only a portion may be affected. In their appearance, these bumps resemble the skin swelling induced by the stinging hairs of nettle (Lat. Urtica dioica).
The most important step is to identify the triggers and determine the individual threshold. Then, the trigger must be avoided to the extent this is possible. Do continue your diary to document the course of the disease accurately. Fewer attacks or a decrease in the severity of attacks is already a success.
Features: 

Information about urtikaria
Test: Do I have urticaria?
Urtikaria control test
7-day Urticaria Aktivity-Score
Angiooedema Aktivity-Score
Urticaria diary

In this 'Allergy Free Cookie Recipes App', there are great recipes for pancakes, doughnuts, and waffles‚Äîfoods that are usually a big taboo for those with food allergies. Eating these types of foods at restaurants or bakeries is often out of the question, but my versions of these items are so good, you won‚Äôt be able to tell they‚Äôre completely dairy, egg, and nut-free. These are dishes you and your family can turn to again and again. 

Making cookies is a great way to create timeless childhood memories for your children. The best part is the children in our neighborhood don‚Äôt know the difference between these cookies and more traditional ones. They just know they taste wonderful. 


 The best part about making these recipes is that most of them can be frozen after cooling and reheated and served later. Even the pancakes and waffles freeze beautifully, which is great when you want to serve your kids a warm breakfast but are short on time.

title: ALLERGENA - Allergy Relief
description:
Allergena Zones 1-9 are designed to combat the most allergenic trees, weeds & grasses in your area. What ails someone in New York (Zone 2) is not the same as what discomforts a fellow in Houston (Zone 5). The triggers are different; thus the remedies must be different.  

HOW DOES ALLERGENA WORK?  
The immune system defends us against disease. When harmful substances are detected, such as pollens, the immune system must create antibodies. Allergena is a homeopathic formula of antigens (i.e. tree, weed and grass species) that are introduced to the body to stimulate the creation of appropriate antibodies. These antibodies will than destroy or neutralize pollens (AND/OR dust, mold) that are causing your allergic reactions. Allergena products include Allergena Zone 1-9, Mold Mix, Dust+Mite, Pet Dander, Fragrance. We even have Allergena for Pets! 

Our homeopathic allergy drops use radically diluted and succussed substances that they are able to gently induce the desired response in the individual and promote overall health without overloading the immune system. Allergena teaches the body to build immunity by giving micro doses of what a person is allergic to so the body becomes safely conditioned to tolerate those allergens and reduce allergic symptoms. 

WHY HOMEOPATHY? 
Homeopathy is a medical system based on the belief that the body can cure itself. Homeopathic practitioners treat illness in a way that intends to facilitate a natural healing of the individual at the most elemental level, and as gently as possible, by using infinitesimally minute doses (often imperceptible to the microscope) of a substance. The way a practitioner chooses a remedy is via the principle of "like cures like." In other words, something that causes symptoms in a healthy person can ‚Äì in very small doses ‚Äì treat the symptoms. Tiny amounts of natural substances, like plants and minerals are used to stimulate the healing process. It is a practice that was esteemed as far back as Hippocrates, the father of modern medicine. 

WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE IN THE KIDS FORMULAS? 
Kids formulas have the same active ingredients as the adult formulas. The Kids formulas are in a base of glycerin that tastes sweet. The adult formulas are in a base of alcohol. Kids formulas are an excellent alternative to those wanting to avoid alcohol. 

WHY ARE THERE HERBAL DRAINAGE REMEDIES IN THE FORMULA? 
Drainage remedies assist your body in opening up drainage routes to allow the discharge of toxic substances which may have accumulated. Elimination of these toxins can promote an ease of recovery from the effects of allergies.   

FOLLOWING DIRECTIONS IS CRITICAL. 
Consider this idea: Allergena formulas are "teaching" your body to build antibodies. Keeping the formula in your system throughout the day ensures that the proper "tools" are present to create the antibodies necessary to reduce allergies.  

HOW DO I TAKE ALLERGENA? 
Frequent administration of Allergena is essential to building immunity. Recommended dosage for adults is 10-15 drops under the tongue, 3 times daily. Children (age 2-12), 6-10 drops under the tongue, 3 times daily, before or after meals. Allow drops to be absorbed orally, then swallow.  Acute allergy attack: Administer 5-8 drops per hour, in addition to 3 times daily.  

SEVERE AND LONG TERM ALLERGIES? 
Pre-Season: Begin Allergena 1-2 weeks before the allergy season at a recommended dosage of 6 drops under the tongue, 3 times daily. During Allergy Season: Increase to your recommended dosage. Post-Season: For best results, reduce your recommended dosage to 5-8 drops under the tongue once daily for the two weeks following the allergy season.  

Allergena‚Äôs success began with health professionals across the US in early 1980. Consumer demand provided opportunity for Allergena to expand into retail health stores by the mid 1990‚Äôs. Today, it is available from health professionals, online, and throughout retail stores across the country.

title: Allergies & Immunology Exam QA
description:
Allergies, Hypersensitivities & immunology:

Get Free Study notes, exam quizzes, terms & definitions and Prepare & Pass Your Exam easily to guarantee the highest score.

Allergies, also known as allergic diseases, are a number of conditions caused by hypersensitivity of the immune system to something in the environment that usually causes little problem in most people.These diseases include hay fever, food allergies, atopic dermatitis, allergic asthma, and anaphylaxis.Symptoms may include red eyes, an itchy rash, runny nose, shortness of breath, or swelling. Food intolerances and food poisoning are separate conditions

Common allergens include pollen and food. Metals and other substances may also cause problems. Food, insect stings, and medications are common causes of severe reactions. Their development is due to both genetic and environmental factors. The underlying mechanism involves immunoglobulin E antibodies (IgE), part of the body's immune system, binding to an allergen and then to a receptor on mast cells or basophils where it triggers the release of inflammatory chemicals such as histamine.Diagnosis is typically based on a person's medical history. Further testing of the skin or blood may be useful in certain cases. Positive tests, however, may not mean there is a significant allergy to the substance in question

With this app you can learn on the Go, Anytime & Everywhere. The learning & understanding process never been so easy like with our 5 study modes embedded in this app.

This app is a combination of sets, containing practice questions, study cards, terms & concepts for self learning & exam preparation on the topic of Allergies, Hypersensitivities & immunology.

Our Learners get the best, that's why they don't just meet standards, They exceed them.

By the end of this app we expect that you expand your knowledge, widen your expertise, improve your practical skills and Broaden your academic & career horizons.

We promise that this app will strengthen your self-confidence during the exam & daily work.

Get the Skills you need to land the job you want.

Learn & educate your self as much as you can, knowledge is the real and best capital & assets that you own.

Invest in your Success Now. Your investment in knowledge, professionalism & expertise is durable & with a High value added. It's a High return investment.

title: Intol ‚Äî Scans food intolerances
description:
New: Intol Version 3
Developed from scratch with additional features: Get Intol 3

You put one product after another back on the shelf because you can't tolerate it?
You now know that the intolerable ingredient is hidden at the back of the table of contents, but do you still sometimes catch one?

That won't happen to you in the future, with Intol!

Intol scans lists of ingredients and immediately recognizes what you do not tolerate.

Whether at home or directly in the supermarket: 
Simply hold the camera of your smartphone on the content of the packaging. The ingredients are marked in color:

Red ~ not tolerable
Orange ~ poorly tolerable
Yellow ~ moderately tolerable

A green "OK" means that you can tolerate it. Scanned, checked!

The following intolerances are supported:

- Lactose intolerance
- Histamine intolerance
- Fructose intolerance

New: Intol Version 3
Developed from scratch with additional features: Get Intol 3

You put one product after another back on the shelf because you can't tolerate it?
You now know that the intolerable ingredient is hidden at the back of the table of contents, but do you still sometimes catch one?

That won't happen to you in the future, with Intol!

Intol scans lists of ingredients and immediately recognizes what you do not tolerate.

Whether at home or directly in the supermarket:
Simply hold the camera of your smartphone on the content of the packaging. The ingredients are marked in color:

title: Dog Allergies Guide
description:
This app contains about Dog Allergies. Learn everything and you will find tips and knowledge to keep your dog stay healthy.

If you think your dog is alone in suffering from dog allergies, then you'll be shocked to find out that nearly 1/3 of all dogs suffer from some form of dog allergy in their life. Dog allergies may be seasonal, they may happen only once, or they may be a chronic issue. No matter what or when the allergies may strike, the number one goal of any dog owner is to seek dog allergy treatment methods that are available so that they can make their pet as comfortable as possible.


In this app, we will disscuss the following topics:

‚Ä¢ Pet Allergies? How To Be A Good Guest, or Host
‚Ä¢ Dog Food Allergies: Explained By Expert Pet Nutritionist
‚Ä¢ 3 Ways to Treat Allergic Dermatitis in Dogs
‚Ä¢ How a Dog Allergy Cure Can Help Your Dog
‚Ä¢ Dog Allergies: Symptoms, Causes, Testing, Treatments and 8 Tips
‚Ä¢ Dog Allergy - Food Allergy In Dogs
‚Ä¢ Everything You Need To Know About Dog Allergies
‚Ä¢ Ways to Help Your Itchy Dog With Allergies
‚Ä¢ How to Stop Dog Allergies with Powerful Treatments That Work
‚Ä¢ Common Fall Allergies in Dogs


And much more..


[ Features ]

- Easy & simple guide book app
- Periodic update of contents
- Support Offline Database 
- Shareable contents
- You can ask questions from our experts
- Send us your suggestions and we will add it


A little words about Dog Allergies:

Dog allergies are one of the most common conditions affecting dogs. Dog allergies can be very frustrating for both yourself and your dog. The constant itching and scratching, paw licking and chewing, skin rashes or chronic ear infections can make life very unpleasant.

Dogs allergies become noticeable when your dog's immune system reacts excessively to substances (called allergens or antigens) to which she has been exposed. Generally, allergies show up in three ways. The most common is with the skin - your dog will itch and scratch either in one area or all over, or you will see skin sores or lesions. Another way involves the respiratory system and your dog may cough, sneeze, and/or wheeze, and there may be an associated nasal or eye discharge. A third type of allergic reaction involves the digestive system, when your dog vomits or has diarrhea.

There are several types of dog allergies. Conventionally, Veterinarians focus on five different types, but I have grouped them into three areas - these are the most common allergies you will see with your dog. The first is external allergies, and these include flea allergies; the second allergy group is with food; and the third is environmental, and this includes inhalant, from allergens such as pollens and house dust mites.

Dog allergies can be difficult to diagnose. Many of the symptoms you may see can be a result of allergies or of another illness. It is best to get your pet examined by your Veterinarian first, before trying any home or alternative dog allergies treatments.


Download Dog Allergies app now to read more..

title: Asthma and Allergy Healing

The Asthma & Allergy Healing application is a practical interactive audio book that contains the effective techniques of support and self-help of the Indalo Codex Method to integrally cure asthma, respiratory allergies and improve the quality of life of children, adults and pregnant women. 
 If you have suffered from respiratory allergies, asthma, negative emotions, rhinitis, chronic bronchitis or persistent cough, it is very beneficial to learn to use the power of the mind and will to favor the biological processes of natural self-healing (Allergy Stop). 
TREATMENT WITHOUT SIDE EFFECTS	
Your positive and proactive psychological attitude makes more effective: holistic medicine, medical treatment, anti-allergy vaccines, psychoneuroimmunology, homeopathy, naturopathy, natural medicine, alternative therapies and even home cough remedies for asthma and allergies. 
The Indalo Codex Method uses psychophysical exercises, positive affirmations, and dynamic meditation to encourage the immune system to optimize its functions. 
Thousands of people from different countries have used my Indalo Codex Method since its publication by the SIRIO Publishing House in 2007. Many people confessed in their testimonies that they felt improvement quickly, that they could sleep well and that the following year they did not suffer allergies or they were very mild. See testimonials at http://alergiaalpolen.com/testimonios-en-video/ 

Use these 5 keys to heal respiratory allergies and asthma:
 1. Recover the natural relationship of peaceful tolerance with pollen, grasses, mites, dust, dogs, cats, trees and other allergens                                                                                                       2. Adopt a positive attitude and a healing thought with defined expectations and goals of respiratory health.                                                                                                                                             3. Conscious breathing through psychophysical exercises to calm and control anxiety, breathe well and feel good.                                                                                                                                       4. Self-control to avoid or overcome asthma attacks and to harmonize emotions or beliefs that may have been somatic in breathing and are the origin of asthma.                                                            5. Individualized nutritional awareness and low histamine diet to avoid foods that increase the symptoms of allergies.
THE APP CONTAINS 
 -3 ESSENTIAL EXERCISES to breathe well and to recover the relationship of tolerance to airborne allergens.                                                                                                                                        -COMPLEMENTARY EXERCISES of asthma attack control, natural nasal breathing, animation of natural defenses, controlling anxiety and harmonizing emotions.                                                      -THE HISTAMINE TABLE tells you which foods can increase allergy symptoms.                                -WORLD -POLLEN LEVELS that connects you via the Internet with the aerobiology stations.         -DEVELOPMENT allows you to track the intensity of allergy symptoms and asthma and your progression.                                                                                                                                                     -MEDICAL APPOINTMENTS is an agenda that alerts you through an alarm of your appointments with the doctor or allergist.                                                                                                                          -PREVENTIVE MEASURES provides a comprehensive list of measures to be taken at home or in outings to avoid respiratory crisis.

title: EpiCenter App for Food Allergies | by AssureTech
description:
The EpiCenter App was designed to make navigating life with a food allergy easier by providing support during an allergic reaction, helping manage your auto-injectors, and connecting you with a number of resources in the online community.

- Locate the nearest hospital(s) during an emergency

- Simultaneously call emergency services and send an SMS alert to your emergency contacts with your GPS location

- Display a medical I.D. and translated "help" message

- Track your epinephrine's expiration date & remember your auto-injector with our upcoming hardware

- Connect with resources in the community like safe-to-eat food, blogs, podcasts, news, & FDA updates

AssureTech, LLC was founded by a lifelong member of the food allergy community & continues to partner with like-minded organizations to connect users with as many resources as possible.

title: Pic My Allergy
description:
Have you ever been to a party and was not sure if the dish had peanuts in it? Can't ask the chef so you just decide not to eat it?

Well, not anymore!

Using Clarifai's Food Recognition Model, Pic My Allergy will tell you if you are allergic to anything in the picture of your next dish. The app uses a technology that reads your picture and spits out the top 20 possible ingredients of the recipe. If any of those match your allergies, the app lets you know exactly which ones and the likelihood of that ingredient being in the dish in < 1 second.

Features
üçö Choose from over 900 possible allergies

descriptionHTML:
Have you ever been to a party and was not sure if the dish had peanuts in it? Can't ask the chef so you just decide not to eat it?

Well, not anymore!

Using Clarifai's Food Recognition Model, Pic My Allergy will tell you if you are allergic to anything in the picture of your next dish. The app uses a technology that reads your picture and spits out the top 20 possible ingredients of the recipe. If any of those match your allergies, the app lets you know exactly which ones and the likelihood of that ingredient being in the dish in < 1 second.

Features
üçö Choose from over 900 possible allergies
üçö Snap or upload a picture of your food
üçö Get results in less than a second


[DISCLAIMER] This app uses Clarifai API. It is the best free ML API out there but this app is only as good as Clarifai's general Food model. Use at your own risk. Please note that the developer is not responsible for any health issues arising from using this app. https://www.clarifai.com/models/food-image-recognition-model-bd367be194cf45149e75f01d59f77ba7
summary: Find out if you might be allergic to a dish by snapping a picture of it!
recentChanges:
What's new
-------------------
This is the first release of Pic My Allergy. Hope y'all like it!
comments: A great resource for anyone with dietary restrictions, very helpful when you're going out to eat.

title: Medscape
description:
Medscape is the leading online destination for physicians and healthcare professionals worldwide. Designed to provide a personalized experience, the Medscape app offers the latest medical news and expert commentary in your specialty as well as drug and disease information, relevant professional education, and CME/CE activities. Access what you need, when you need it ‚Äî for FREE. 

What‚Äôs New?
* Get fast, reliable clinical answers all in one place with Medscape Decision Point. Medscape Decision Point combines evidence-based treatment options with trusted expert commentary. Now supporting multiple specialties, including Allergy, Cardiology, Dermatology, Hematology/Oncology, and Neurology. 

Additional Feature
* Access 400+ medical calculators, grouped by specialty for quicker and easier use!
* Check out other useful resources including our Drug Interaction Checker, Pill Identifier, step-by-step procedural videos, and more. 
* Look up the most current prescribing and safety information on 8500+ prescription and OTC drugs, herbals, and supplements.
* Explore our tailored newsfeed; read the latest medical news and expert commentary in your specialty. 
* Stay current with the latest FDA approvals, conference news, late-breaking clinical trial data, and more.
* Earn free CME/CE credits and ABIM MOC points on-the-go, and monitor your progress with our built-in Activity Tracker.
* Access the largest network for physicians and medical students with Consult.
* Use your Medscape account to access the Medscape app. Don't have a Medscape account? You can sign up for free when you download the app‚Äîit takes only a few seconds.

Do you have feedback for the Medscape team? Email us at medscapemobile@webmd.net

comments: This app was invaluable during medical school and internship, but recently the amount of ads makes it nearly unusable. There are more ads on the page than script. I would gladly pay a subscription to avoid the ads, but instead it appears I will not be using this app and will be searching for something better.

What I felt is that for all drugs a doctor cannot remember its adverse effects and interactions with other drugs. This is a good base to help know interactions before prescribing any new drug. I recommend to use it. And I recommend the developers to include newer drugs also.

Fantastic app. Provides valuable information on diseases and medical conditions. Would be very valuable to someone currently in or planning on going into the health field as well as provide useful information and tools for the average person.

Used to be a 5 star. Indispensable tool. After a few updates, especially after ads were added, the app freezes all the time. It's almost impossible to work. Please fix this as this is one the best apps for medical professionals.
This app used to be very good but in the last 2 months now I've downloaded and deleted it about 7 times. It keeps stopping itself, I can't even use it at all.

title: Allergy Free Bread Recipes
description:
The term Allergy free - refers to the recipes in the App that are Milk Free, Nuts Free, Eggs Free and Free from Diary by-products.

In this 'Allergy Free Bread Recipes App', there are great recipes for pancakes, doughnuts, and waffles‚Äîfoods that are usually a big taboo for those with food allergies. Eating these types of foods at restaurants or bakeries is often out of the question, but my versions of these items are so good, you won‚Äôt be able to tell they‚Äôre completely dairy, egg, and nut-free. These are dishes you and your family can turn to again and again. 

 The best part about making these recipes is that most of them can be frozen after cooling and reheated and served later. Even the pancakes and waffles freeze beautifully, which is great when you want to serve your kids a warm breakfast but are short on time. 

The Recipes that are free from Egg, Nuts, Milk etc, included in this App are :-

vte
Immunology is a branch of biology that covers the study of immune systems in all organisms.Immunology charts, measures, and contextualizes the: physiological functioning of the immune system in states of both health and diseases; malfunctions of the immune system in immunological disorders (such as autoimmune diseases, hypersensitivities immune deficiency,[6] and transplant rejection); the physical, chemical and physiological characteristics of the components of the immune system in vitro, in situ, and in vivo. Immunology has applications in numerous disciplines of medicine, particularly in the fields of organ transplantation, oncology, rheumatology, virology, bacteriology, parasitology, psychiatry, and dermatology.


Allergies, also known as allergic diseases, are a number of conditions caused by hypersensitivity of the immune system to typically harmless substances in the environment. These diseases include hay fever, food allergies, atopic dermatitis, allergic asthma, and anaphylaxis. Symptoms may include red eyes, an itchy rash, sneezing, a runny nose, shortness of breath, or swelling. Food intolerances and food poisoning are separate conditions.

title: Asthma
description:
do you know How to find out if You Have "Asthma" or not ?
Isn‚Äôt it time to know about What Are the Signs and Symptoms of Asthma ?
Have you ever thought about Common causes of Asthma ?
Don‚Äôt worry , With Our App You will be able to find all the information about Asthma

what is asthma :

 ‚Ä¢ asthma definition 
 
"Asthma" is a common long-term inflammatory disease of the airways of the lungs . It is characterized by variable and recurring symptoms ,
reversible airflow obstruction , and bronchospasm . "asthma symptoms" include episodes of wheezing , coughing ...
These episodes may occur a few times a day or a few times per week. Depending on the person , they may become worse at night or with exercise induced asthma  .

 ‚Ä¢ causes of asthma

Asthma is thought to be caused by a combination of genetic and environmental factors. Environmental factors include exposure to air pollution 
and allergen . Other potential triggers include medications such as aspirin and beta blockers. Diagnosis is usually based on the pattern of symptoms , 
response to therapy over time , and spirometry . "Asthma" is classified according to the frequency of symptoms, forced expiratory volume in one second , 
and peak expiratory flow rate . It may also be classified as atopic or non-atopic , where atopy refers to a predisposition toward developing a type 1
hypersensitivity reaction

 ‚Ä¢ asthma symptoms 

bronchitis symptoms , which include wheezing , coughing , and chest tightness , are most common in an "asthma attack" . 
Sometimes "asthma" is called bronchial asthma or reactive airway disease .
 
  The Common Symptoms Of Asthma Are :

   - Wheezing (a whistling, squeaky sound when you breathe)
   - Shortness of breath
   - Rapid breathing
   - Chest tightness
   - Coughing
   
  ‚Ä¢ causes of asthma :
 
 - Tobacco Smoke
 - Dust Mites
 - Outdoor Air Pollution
 - Respiratory infections
 - Exercise
 - Hypersensitivity
 - Cockroach Allergen
 - Pets
 - Mold
 - Smoke From Burning Wood or Grass
 - Gerd
 - Other Triggers
  
  
   
   
   This app will tell you exactly :
   
   ‚Ä¢ How Can You Tell if You Have "Asthma" ?
   ‚Ä¢ Asthma copd differences between ?
   ‚Ä¢ What triggers bronchial asthma ?
   ‚Ä¢ What Is an Asthma Attack ?
   ‚Ä¢ Asthma signs and symptoms ?
   ‚Ä¢ Causes of Asthma Attack ?
   ‚Ä¢ How is asthma treated and controlled ?
   
   What more you can learn with our apps :
  
  - Bronchitis Symptoms
  - Asbestosis
  - Bronchiectasis
  - Bronchopulmonary Dysplasia
  - COPD
  - Cystic Fibrosis
  - Emphysema
  - Pneumonia
  - Laryngitis
  - Pharyngitis
  - Influenza
  - Lung Cancer
  - Tuberculosis
  - Pulmonary Fibrosis
  - Pulmonary Vascluar Disease
  - Allergy . Allergies , also known as allergic diseases
  
  
And much more.

So what are you waiting for?
Download now and enjoy

title: Asthma Health Storylines
description:
Asthma Storylines from the Allergy & Asthma Network, and powered by Health Storylines‚Ñ¢, is a self-care tool for managing asthma for yourself or your loved one. 

Asthma Storylines allows you to track and gain insights about daily asthma control for yourself or your child, keep track of questions you have for your healthcare provider, and more. It gives you an accurate, shareable record of the asthma experience between physician visits, and helps you and your care-team collaborate on treatment strategies. 

Take control of asthma with these powerful Health Tools:

‚Ä¢ Track and gain insights about daily asthma control 
‚Ä¢ Take notes on questions you have for your healthcare provider before visits and during visits
‚Ä¢ Track medication and set reminders so you don‚Äôt forget a dose (Disclaimer: App only contains medication database for US and Canada at this time. Other countries medication databases coming soon.) 
‚Ä¢ Track symptoms to monitor how you or your loved one is doing over time
‚Ä¢ Document moods to see the impact of emotional health on overall wellbeing
‚Ä¢ Remember important dates and events with an in-app calendar 
‚Ä¢ Record weight and other vitals to have handy whenever you need them
‚Ä¢ Document your health and daily living with a journal
‚Ä¢ Invite the people who care for you to connect as part of your Circle of Support. Share progress with them in real time. Let them empower you with their support and encouragement, give you a boost when you need it, and celebrate your milestones. 

The Asthma Storylines mobile app is free for all users. There is also a Web version available, accessible through the browser of any desktop computer or mobile device.

title: KagenAir
description:
Does weather affect your health?¬† You know it does. 

Find out how with KagenAir‚Ñ¢ ‚Ä¶

There are many Apps for weather and many Apps for health, but KagenAir‚Ñ¢ is the only App that can show you which environmental factors affect you most. 

Answer a few questions each day, and over time you‚Äôll see what is triggering your allergy and asthma symptoms.

WHAT WE DO ‚Ä¶

We constantly monitor changes in the weather across North America.  By comparing your daily symptoms with changes in the weather around you, we can help you discover which factors affect you most ‚Äì revealing your unique Aller-Rhythm¬Æ display.

TALK WITH A SPECIALIST‚Ä¶ 

Nothing should come between you and your doctor.  That‚Äôs why we created a convenient TeleMedicine tool to make it easy for you to find help from local doctors and nurses interested in helping you.  It‚Äôs called Quick Chat! ‚Ñ¢ 

WHAT‚ÄôS NEW ...

-  Monitor your symptoms of allergy and asthma.
-  Connect with Allergy Specialists by phone or secure video chat.	
-  Discover your own unique environmental Triggers.
-  Receive severe weather alerts from the National Weather Service.
-  New validated symptom tests for hay fever (rhinitis) and asthma.
-  See how weather affects the way you feel.
-  Receive local weather updates each hour.
-  New animated health risk maps and pollution maps.
-  See your 3-day forecast for allergy and asthma symptoms.
-  Share your unique Aller-Rhythm¬Æ display with friends and family.

We also make it easy for you to find the closest pharmacy anywhere in the United States, and you may also receive valuable coupons to help you feel well.

WHO NEEDS KagenAir ... 

Anyone using Allegra, Claritin, Zyrtec, Flonase, Nasacort, Nasonex, Dymista, Advair, Dulera, Symbicort, Breo, Albuterol, Proventil, Flovent, Aerospan, Asmanex or Benadryl will appreciate KagenAir.

PERSONALIZED MEDICINE ‚Ä¶   

As you continue taking easy symptom tests, your unique Aller-Rhythm¬Æ display reveals your personal forecast for experiencing allergy and asthma symptoms. 

Everyday you‚Äôll see personalized wind maps that reveal your unique risks for experiencing symptoms of allergy and asthma.  By seeing how the weather and your environment affect your health, you‚Äôll be in control.

How does weather affect your health?¬† Find out with KagenAir.

title: How to Get Rid Of Allergies
description:
Who else is sneezing every few seconds and wiping pollen from their car every morning? Just me? 

Allergies are terrible. So many people make plans around their allergies, canceling outdoor events if they know that the pollen is going to be bad. Sound familiar?

Allergies thrive when your immune system is down. Consider reviewing your diet to ensure you are supporting your immune system.

Here‚Äôs my list of handy-dandy allergy remedies you can use to help keep the worst of the allergies at bay.

Not all techniques will work to the same extent with different people. But these are the ones with the best results, according to what I have tested and researched.

title: Carroll Food Intolerance
description:
Before downloading, make sure you have received an Access Code from your Naturopathic Doctor.

This is a searchable database / resource list of thousands of foods that have been evaluated by doctors who practice with the Carroll Food Intolerance Method for improving the health and outcomes of their patients.

If you are a user of the Carroll Food Intolerance Method, this application will significantly improve your health by helping you avoid foods that contain your Intolerance.

Simply select your Primary Intolerance(s) and Combination(s) to get a list of foods that is custom prepared just for you.

Your Food Intolerances are your primary source of total body inflammation and toxemia, which leads to illness.

Enjoy this Application as you search for foods that do not contain your Food Intolerance.

title: Health Log
description:
Health Log makes it quick and easy to track your health related information. Health Log provides an extremely flexible logging system making it easy to keep track of any health related information such as headaches, cramps, coughs, colds, nausea, anxiety, depression, menstruation, arthritis, allergies, panic attacks, seizures, specific mental states and any other custom records. With each record you can record the severity of the event as well as the kind of pains, locations of the pain, potential triggers, any medications taken and if they provided relief.

‚Ä¢ Fast, simple and straightforward way to log and track and health event
‚Ä¢ Keeping logs of your health can help find the causes, most effective treatment and give a better general understanding of your health
‚Ä¢ Extremely customize-able with the ability to track any information you want such as any type of pain/symptom any location where the pain is, any potential triggers, and medication and the quantity taken
‚Ä¢ Health records can be shown to doctors to give them solid information to help diagnose any potential issues
‚Ä¢ Track the severity of headaches, cramps, coughs, colds, nausea, anxiety, depression, menstruation, arthritis, allergies, panic attacks, seizures and any other custom information
‚Ä¢ Track when headaches, cramps, coughs, colds, nausea, anxiety, depression, menstruation, arthritis, allergies, panic attacks and any other custom event happens and for how long
‚Ä¢ Track the type of pain associated with a health event such as migraine, throbbing, dull, sharp nausea and many more. Custom pains can be added as well
‚Ä¢ Track the locations of a health event such as temples, sinus, forehead and many more. Custom locations can be added as well
‚Ä¢ Track the potential triggers of health events such as stress, lack of sleep, loud noises, sunlight and many more. Custom triggers can be added as well
‚Ä¢ Track the medications and the quantities taken for such as ibuprofen (Advil), acetaminophen (Tylenol), antihistamines and any other custom medication
‚Ä¢ Track the relief experienced by medications or treatments
‚Ä¢ Update records quickly and easily to adjust for changes in your health event
‚Ä¢ View a variety of statistics about your records such as how many headaches, cramps, coughs, colds, nausea, anxiety, depression, menstruation, arthritis, allergies, panic attacks or seizures have been recorded, how many days since your last health event, average severity, average duration, most common pains, locations and medications
‚Ä¢ View statistics related to any specific recorded association, such as how many headaches, cramps, coughs, colds, nausea, anxiety, depression, allergies, panic attacks or seizures are associated with a pressing pain, or stress as a trigger
‚Ä¢ View your events in a calendar view. Quickly and easily update, delete or add new events from the calendar view. The calendar view can be useful in finding patterns in health events
‚Ä¢ View your events on a graph by year, month week or all health events at once. The graph view can be useful in finding patterns in health events

Upgrade
‚Ä¢ Upgrade Health Log to enable exporting your records as a spreadsheet that can be viewed with any spreadsheet reading program such as Google Sheets and Microsoft Excel
‚Ä¢ Upgrading enables the option to export your logs as a database backup that can be used to restore your records on a new device when switching phones or on the same phone. Includes Dropbox automatic syncing to easily switch between devices as well as make manual backups to Dropbox
‚Ä¢ Upgrading removes ads

Customization
‚Ä¢ Choose to have times displayed in AM/PM or 24 hour format
‚Ä¢ Select which day of the week to be the first day of the week
‚Ä¢ Select which statistics you wish to view on the home screen

Health Log can be an effective health log, health tracker, fitness trackers, health diary, headache tracker, headache diary, useful for headache tracking, head ache prevention and stopping head aches

recentChanges:
- Added ability to sort records by date, severity, and relief
- Added summary option when viewing records
- Added option to select minutes, hours or days when entering a record
- Interface updates
- Bug fixes
comments: So far this is excellent. I was recently diagnosed with depression and need to keep track of my symptoms as well as effects of medications. Most of the other apps have a pre-set list of symptoms, and user is limited to those symptoms. This app allows you to create your own labels for symptoms, so you can be very specific with tracking your health issues. Also, the app creates a nice graph for visual representation of your symptoms. This app is exactly what i needed.
I was searching for a log which seemed to be quite difficult until I found health log. You can add symptoms to the list, and pain levels. Just what I wanted.

HELP option needed. It does everything I need so far. Had to read 100+ reviews to find developer comments to learn how to use, how to edit, etc. A "how to/help" in the dropdown menu is missing. Also, haven't yet figured out tracking >1 person. I got this to track my kid but would like to add myself. Overall it works well so far. Also, I haven't upgraded. Access to the full version (3day trial) would probably yield more upgrades. If full is just ad removal I'm ok with ads
Good pain track and has a calendar view. Handy for a cancer patient like me. I haven't upgraded so far but i'll see in a few days when i need to backup.
Really useful to track so I can keep my doctors up to date. However this morning when I went to sort categories it crashes everytime! EDIT: All fixed! Rating edited to 5 stars.

title: Mount Sinai Guides: Allergy
description:
This Wiley - Blackwell app-book,Mount Sinai Expert Guides: Allergy and Clinical Immunology,is developed by MedHand Mobile Libraries. Improve your performance with relevant, valid material which is accessed quickly and with minimal effort in the palm of your hand using MedHand‚Äôs patented technology.

THIS APP-BOOK includes unique functions such as:

‚Ä¢	A powerful search 
‚Ä¢	Bookmarks
‚Ä¢	Complete set of medical calculators; Body Mass Index, Peak Expiratory Flows, Dehydration Correction Calculator and more 
‚Ä¢	Highlighting
‚Ä¢	High resolution pictures
‚Ä¢	History
‚Ä¢	Notes and picture notes

Mount Sinai Expert Guides: Allergy and Clinical Immunology will provide trainees in allergy and immunology with an extremely clinical and accessible handbook covering the major disorders and symptoms, their diagnosis and clinical management. 

Perfect as a point-of-care resource on the hospital wards and also as a refresher for board exam preparation, the focus throughout is on providing rapid reference, essential information on each disorder to allow for quick, easy browsing and assimilation of the must-know information. All chapters follow a consistent template including the following features:

‚Ä¢	An opening bottom-line/key points section
‚Ä¢	Classification, pathogenesis and prevention of disorder
‚Ä¢	Evidence-based diagnosis, including relevant algorithms, laboratory and imaging tests, and potential pitfalls when diagnosing a patient
‚Ä¢	Disease management including commonly used medications with dosages, management algorithms and how to prevent complications
‚Ä¢	How to manage special populations, ie, in pregnancy, children and the elderly
‚Ä¢	The very latest evidence-based results, major society guidelines and key external sources to consult

If you're specialising in allergy and immunology and require concise, practical and clinical guidance from one of the world's leading institutions in this field, then this is the perfect book for you.


Authors: Hugh A. Sampson (Editor), Scott L. Friedman (Series Editor)

Publisher: Wiley ‚Äì Blackwell


________________________________________ 

MedHand Mobile Libraries offers a SUBSCRIPTION FREE application without edition upgrade. The apps enables you to make notes, picture notes, search, medical calculators, add bookmarks and review what you previously been reading.

MedHand delivers what you need, trusted knowledge at the point of care! Offering most trusted and well recognized medical guidelines provided by excellent publishers like Oxford University Press, McGraw-Hill, PDR Network LLC, Wiley and more.

title: Angelina's Food Allergy Guide
description:
Food allergies are common and can be difficult to diagnose. Children may be especially vulnerable to reactions from food. Use this handy guide to find information about allergy causes and symptoms, foods to avoid and ingredients to watch for on product labels. 

Includes the following categories:

Breads & Cereals
Eggs 
Milk & Cheese
MSG
Food Coloring

title: ICE - In Case of Emergency - Medical Contact Card
description:
ICE - In Case of Emergency - Medical Contact Card is a very useful app and can even prove to be a lifesaver in an emergency situation. Using this app, you can store emergency contacts and other essential information which can help save your life if you were to be in an unfortunate accident.

Using ICE- In Case of Emergency - Medical Contact card, you can create your medical contact card directly on your phone which will be available on the screen without the need to unlock the phone. With the personal details that will be available on the emergency contacts card including medical conditions, blood group, emergency contact number, etc, you will be able to receive the assistance that you may need in an emergency situation. Besides this basic information, you also have the option to add additional information such as allergies, medicine, and disease.

With ICE App, the first time responders will easily have access to all the information they will need to provide you with medical emergency help and also to call your loved ones. The app also includes a ‚Äòsecret‚Äô section which will be encrypted with a passcode so that only a loved one who has the passcode may have access to the information inside it. The screen will display a message directing the responders to contact the person with the passcode. Other details like your vaccine history, physician contact and insurance may also be stored in the app and may come in handy when receiving medical emergency help.   


How will responders access the information?
The responders will be redirected to the emergency medical ID or information stored in the app when they tap the notification bar on the lock screen of your phone.  

How to show Notification/Floating icon over locked screen?
Under More tab, you will see Notification / Lock Screen feature and clicking on that you can enable or disable the each feature from lock screen. You must provide some permission to allow this. Notification is by default. 

Which languages are supported?
The Medical ID ICE App currently offers support for 7 languages: English, Italian, German, Dutch, French, Turkish and Polish but will include more upon request from the users.  

How can the premium version be unlocked?
Go to the ‚ÄòMore‚Äô tab on ICE Emergency app and tap ‚Äòupgrade to premium‚Äô. You will just need to pay USD $8 to receive access to unlimited features on the ICE - In Case of Emergency.

What does the premium version offer?
Among the unlimited features that you have access to with the premium version of ICE Emergency app, here are the most notable ones:
‚óè	You can store a 30-second voice recording which will appear on the profile page. This feature will be an additional asset if you were in need of medical emergency help.
‚óè	By clicking on the ‚ÄòApp lock‚Äô option, you can enable or disable the app lock. This will restrict the user from editing the information unless he or she has the pin or provides fingerprint verification. 
‚óè	You can also back up the medical contact card from the ICE Emergency app into your computer or on Google drive. The information may also be restored onto the Medical ID ICE App from these locations. 

Keeping yourself fully prepared for an emergency situation or accidents never hurts. The sooner you have your digital medical contact card ready, the better. So what are you waiting for? It will barely take a minute to find ICE - In case of emergency App on play store and install it on your phone. 

=========
SAY HELLO
=========

Feel free to comment or email(techxonia@gmail.com) in case you have any queries or suggestions. Your support will help us improve the app and serve you better.

comments: Very detailed and user friendly app. 1 of...if not THE best "In Case of Emergency" app available. Works great as a free app, and even better when purchased. Free app is still useful even without full features, I recommend this and having worked in the ambulance service I wish people would use or have this on their phones more often, saving time is saving lives, this app could one day do just that. Developer is also friendly, helpful and punctual with responding to questions or help.

FORCED TO GIVE A üåü. üò° COMPLETELY USELESS APP...unless you only have one allergy, take only one prescription, no contacts...etc. As soon as you try to enter a second listing of anything, you get a pop-up about upgrading to (and paying for) the premium version. If you have only one medication or allergy & no emergency contacts...this is the app for you. However, if you live in the real world...pass this one by. Looking for the app I had on my old phone ..unlimited entrees & 100% free.

ICE ‚Äì In Case of Emergency, the name says it all. This is an incredibly awesome application! In case of any emergency situation, this application can be used as a medical contact card as well as it can also be useful to reach out to the emergency contacts if needed. It helps a lot and its literally Awesome!

ICE - In Case of Emergency - Medical Contact Card is a very fabulous and amazing app. It is user friendly and easy to use. I like its all features mostly include Emergency Contacts and Medical Emergency Help. Brilliant app. This app is incredible! Thank you very much for your great service.

Easy enough my 5 year old can now call mama for help with the screen locked. App serves it's main purpose well. Has potential for 5 star. -1 star because Ads are too often & aggressive. -1 star because Foreign languages are poorly implemented.

title: AsthmaMD
description:
AsthmaMD is a FREE Android  asthma and COPD management application.

AsthmaMD Peak Flow Meter is now available at every CVS and Walgreens in US (not required to use the app).

It's been the leading app on iphone and the number 1 app recommended by doctors. 

Featured on CBS news, the Wall Street Journal, Toronto Global, USA today, Forbes, Mobile Health News, Tech Crunch and more...

AsthmaMD is easy and quick to use to help you with tracking and managing your Asthma and COPD.

Created by Sam Pejham, MD who wanted a better way to care for his asthma patients. 

Keep a journal of your asthma easily and quickly.

Visualize your asthma activity on a color graph.

Share asthma diary and color graph with your physician.

Use AsthmaMD to help doctors with asthma research.

Manage multiple users with one device, great for families.

Easily pick from a list of medications or add your own. 

Track how medication is helping you manage asthma.

Instantly map your PFM to severity zones.

Track asthma triggers such as:

Allergies, Pollens, Pollutants, etc.

Customize to track FEV1 or PulseOX data. 

AsthmaMD not only helps you track your asthma and COPD but you will also be helping doctors and researchers learn more about asthma, and other asthma sufferers like yourself learn about high asthma locations.
You have an option to participate anonymously and securely using systems managed by google to provide researchers with information that has never been available before. Imagine helping a parent find an area to move that has a lower asthma rates, or pick a school in an area with a lower rate of asthma attacks.

We are going to change asthma research and you have a chance to be part of it.

Support us and asthma and COPD research by downloading and using this app and telling other asthma patients about it.

We want to hear from you, email us at help@AsthmaMD.org

comments: Same as the other comments, can't create an account, just keeps saying bad request and to check the information... Shame since this looks like it would be a useful app.

Nice features but buggy operation. Adding entries to my records and when I look in the daily report section what is displayed or not displayed on any given record keeps changing, lines of info just disappear. Yes, I'm saving them each time. It's very frustrating as the long term picture is what I'm interested in most, and being able to share accurate records with my doctor. Added medications frequently disappear from the list too. I'll try a few more days but also look for a more reliable app.

Frustrating app to use. Save record button not prominent so it didn't save the last few days records. Have to click into each line to enter data, too many clicks. Chart doesn't seem to display (perhaps I hadn't entered enough data?). Clunky. Much preferred Asthma Tracker but y Roving Reptiles but unfortunately that seems to have been discontinued. Will delete this app.
Does not allow sign up. Give error when attempting to sign up.
Cant sign up. Keeps saying "Bad Request." All fields were filled out.

title: Allergic Rhinitis/ Hay Fever
description: An allergy is an inappropriate response by the body's immune system to a substance that is normally harmful. The immune system is a highly complex defense mechanism that helps us to fight infections. Allergic rhinitis/ hay fever is an inflammation inside the nose caused by an allergen such as pollen, foods like ( shellfish, milk, soya, strawberries, chocolate, peanuts, walnuts, and other tree nuts, fish, eggs and wheat) dust , molds, or flakes of skin from certain animals, animal hair, certain metals like nickel, some cosmetics, lanolin, dust mites, insect venom, some common drugs ( such as penicillin and aspirin) some food additives ( such as benzoic acid and sulfur dioxide), animal dander and the chemicals found in soap, washing powder, cleaning supplies, and many other chemicals.

title: Yummly
description:
Yummly is your smart cooking sidekick, offering personalized guidance every step of the way. From recipe recommendations just for you, to handy tools and helpful videos, Yummly has everything you need to improve life in the kitchen. Experience what millions are enjoying on the web, free on your Android device.

‚òÖ 2 million + recipes from the best of the best üë®‚Äçüç≥üë©‚Äçüç≥ü•á

An endless supply of recipes to fuel your next cooking adventure from Yummly‚Äôs test kitchen and top sites like AllRecipes, Epicurious, Food52 to smaller food blogs and everything in between. Every week, thousands of new recipes are added to Yummly for you to discover and Yum. 

‚òÖ Discover recipe recommendations, just for you üçΩÔ∏è 

Set up your taste and nutrition preferences and we‚Äôll only serve up recipes that match. As you use Yummly, like magic, it learns about your likes (and don‚Äôt likes). Yummly will provide you with food recipe recommendations every day that you are sure to love. In a bit of a food rut? Let Yummly help you out with a cornucopia of tasty suggestions for cooking. The more you Yum, the better it gets! 

‚òÖ Step-by-step guided recipes üé¨‚è≤üç¥

Let Yummly do the thinking for you with our step-by-step recipes, including video tutorials, timers, and more handy tools to make cooking a breeze. 

‚òÖ Collect, save, and organize your favorites üíæ

Saving your favorite recipes couldn‚Äôt be easier. With the simple tap of a ‚ÄúYum‚Äù button, your faves are stashed for safekeeping in a digital recipe box. Once saved, create collections for easy organization and viewing when cooking and grocery shopping.

‚òÖ Personalized diets & allergies üçâüçäüå∂Ô∏èüççü•ëüçì

Are you eating vegan, vegetarian, paleo, or gluten free? Do you have a food allergy to dairy, peanuts, or seafood? Simply hate cilantro? Yummly has you covered! We scour recipes from across the web and automatically filter out recipes based on your tastes, allergies, and diets.  

‚òÖ The most powerful way to search for recipes üîç

Why waste time sifting through the wrong recipes? Our unique search filters allow you to find the perfect recipe. Filter by cuisine, nutrition requirements (for calories, carbs, fat, or cholesterol), cook time, technique, and more. 

‚òÖ Recipe scheduling for easy meal planning üìÖ‚è∞
Schedule a recipe to the exact time you want to eat and it's instantly added to your calendar. You'll even get a gentle nudge when it's time to start cooking.

‚òÖ Add entire recipes to your grocery shopping list üóíÔ∏èüõí

With one click you can add a full recipe to your shopping list. Yummly automatically categorizes your shopping list by both aisles and recipes to make your trip to the grocery store a snap. 

‚òÖUse voice commands to keep your screen clean
Navigate hands-free through our step-by-step Guided Recipes with Yummly Voice Control. Just say "Hey Yummly" to activate voice commands so you can move through recipe steps, see ingredients, start timers and more.

Download the free Yummly app today. Let‚Äôs get cookin‚Äô!

comments: This app used to be brilliant, inspiring and easy to use. The updates and new features are time consuming and creatively crippling. Now to find a simple recipe you have to put in all the ingredients you have and even then the search results are sadly limited. Like hello, I'm looking for a recipe to fit the couple of ingredients I want to use up and am *going to buy the other stuff I need*.I've used this app for years but it's extremely unhelpful now, will be looking for an alternative.

App is pretty decent really like the way to have the pantry ready recipies section available. Wish you could add corresponding cookware, where you could add more types of recipes that require different types of tools and cookware. not everyone has a blender or cupcake pans available to them to make some recipes. it'd be nice for unexperienced cooks to have that option to know what to use to cook their food with.

I do not like how you have to tap a button to get directions. I wish they were just done at the bottom of the recipe. I'm also having trouble getting the directions, it just says something like how they're having technical issues. I do really like how organized things are! And how aesthetically pleasing the app is

This app is basically a search engine for cooking; food & recipes. It also includes useful features for tailored results, building recipe lists and of your in the right place, making a shopping list - although the auto-shopping features will not not work for me in Adelaide, South Australia.

I love this app. Been a long-time Pinterest user, but there's just too much other stuff on Pinterest and I like the fact that I can find what I want and not have all the other junk come up too. Great job!

title: Medical ID - In Case of Emergency (ICE)
description:
Medical ID allows creating medical profiles that are accessible from the lock screen of your device. In case of emergency, the app enables quick access to vital information such as your allergies, blood type, medical contacts, etc. that are essential to attending first responders, medics or medical staff having to take action. 

The app includes several features:

‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Quick access to medical information from your lock screen.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Emergency alert feature to send SMS in one click (with your estimated location).
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Direct emergency contacts call from the lock screen without having to unlock.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Body Mass Index (BMI) calculation.
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Current location (address, GPS coordinates).
‚ÄÉ‚Ä¢ Compass.

In emergency situations, a Medical ID could prove to be invaluable to attending medics or other medical personnel providing treatment. Do not wait, turn your Android device into a life-saving tool.

Terms of use:
https://medicalid.app/eula
Privacy policy:
https://medicalid.app/privacy

Note that your medical information remains on your device. Thus, you are responsible for this information and its use. Requested permissions are used for the described features only, not to collect data against your will.

We recommend that you try out the free version before purchasing the premium. Indeed, the app may not work properly on some devices running a customized Android version or making use of apps that "clean up" or kill other apps. The same may apply to devices with specific security settings.

Please contact us by email if you have any questions, or file an issue at:
https://issues.medicalid.app

You can also help to translate or improve the translation of the app. If you are interested, please have a look at:
https://translate.medicalid.app

recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Adds a set of security options to prevent triggering phone or SMS alerts caused by undesired taps on the device screen. You will find the options under "Alerts" in the app settings.
‚Ä¢ Fixes an issue that allowed non-numerical characters to be used as a security code.
‚Ä¢ Fixes a bug with latitude/longitude to Degrees Minutes Seconds (DMS) conversion that was returning a wrong longitude direction.
comments: Excellent app. Icon appears on lock page, double tap to open. No need to give out password or codes to unlock phone. Also once you add emergency contacts, the data will pull from your contact list for direct dialing...just tap the emergency contact name and phone dials them. Easy to use and has plenty of space in each category for allergies, med list, conditions, surgeries or other general useful information in the event of an emergency.

This app is a 'lifesaver'!!! Seriously though, it really is. I have epilepsy absent seizures where I zone out into zombie mode, and this app has had all my medical info and my emergency contacts available for people around me twice, and has it there for any future incidents. Its simple to use, clear, and holds detailed info for medical services to draw upon. I've had issues with the emergency banner lock screen that annoyed me, but that's not to do with this app, more so android bullcrap.

Extremely helpful app. Great for keeping track of all the medications I take. The medical personnel that have seen it all have appreciated it, and have given this app great compliments. They wished all people had it. Makes their job easier and faster.

This app can be opened from my phone's locked screen, so an EMT could view my chronic conditions, meds, & drug allergies. I use the app to double-check my Rx list at every medical appointment. Very handy to have that feature.
I put in all my info. Now every time I attempt to put a widget on my lock screen, the app keeps crashing.

title: Allergy Cooking with Confidence
description:
It is always hard to see your child get sick. But when our younger son, Ben, was just a few months old, he developed chronic eczema and began to lose weight. At five months, he had his first allergic reaction to his first taste of formula milk. It was clear he was ‚Äòatopic‚Äô,
his little immune system was in overdrive and he seemed to be allergic to everything.

Weaning, therefore, became an excruciatingly drawn-out and terrifying ordeal, requiring
military-style organisation. Because Ben might have an allergic reaction to any new food,
we learned early on to wait at least 48 hours after previous reactions. We had to pick
mornings when his brother was in school, in case we needed to deal with ambulances and
hospitals. We learned to touch the food to his lip first, to minimise the initial reaction. I
kept an emergency hospital overnight bag ready by the front door for years ‚Äì just in case.

The hospital‚Äôs nutritional advice, was well meant and helpful. But I was frustrated when
there didn‚Äôt appear to be a comprehensive list of simple recipes I could follow, that
would suit Ben‚Äôs particular needs. So, necessity being the mother of invention, I began
experimenting with our favourite family recipes. Our elder son, Sebastian, coined the
name Hunter‚Äôs Pie, which was one of our first ‚Äòcombined‚Äô family dishes that was
completely ‚ÄòBen friendly‚Äô.

So it was serendipitous that Chloe was willing to help me assemble some of the recipes into a format that might help other families in the same situation. Three years, and much hard work, time and frustration later, here it is - A collection of recipes which are completely free of dairy and egg products. We have also, where possible, tried to offer alternatives for gluten and nut ingredients too.

I am proud to say that every single recipe photograph was taken by me just minutes before
the dish was served to the family. Chloe and I sincerely hope that you will enjoy the recipes
as much as we have enjoyed discovering them.

Ginny Avery

title: Allergy Free Cake Recipes
description:
The term Allergy free - refers to the recipes in the App that are Milk Free, Nuts Free, Eggs Free and Free from Diary by-products.

In this 'Allergy Free Cake Recipes App', there are great recipes for pancakes, doughnuts, and waffles‚Äîfoods that are usually a big taboo for those with food allergies. Eating these types of foods at restaurants or bakeries is often out of the question, but my versions of these items are so good, you won‚Äôt be able to tell they‚Äôre completely dairy, egg, and nut-free. These are dishes you and your family can turn to again and again. 

There is no other dessert that symbolizes celebration more than the cake. Many of our most important moments in life are celebrated with cakes and cupcakes. Whether it is your child‚Äôs first birthday party or your wedding day, you probably served a favorite cake to mark the occasion. 

The Recipes that are free from Egg, Nuts, Milk etc, included in this App are :-

Cakes and Cupcakes

If you are happy with the App, do come back and leave a positive review.

Thank you for your time.

title: Allergo
description:
The Allergo App allows users to rate and review the ""allergy friendliness"" of restaurants, cafes, pubic venues, and airlines. The set ""allergy friendly"" criteria, which must be addressed in every review, enable other users to make more informed choices about which businesses are the best choices for allergy sufferers, making Allergo the perfect app not only for allergy sufferers but also for friends, family members and caregivers of allergy sufferers. 

By drawing attention to the seriousness of the everyday risks faced by allergy sufferers, and educating the broader public on how those risks can be reduced, the Allergo App forms a vital part of our mission to make the world an allergy friendly place. 

Share | Educate | Create

title: HealthChampion Symptoms, Care & Records Manager
description:
Manage health care, track your symptoms, enable remote monitoring and control your family‚Äôs health and medical data with HealthChampion. Take health care into your own hands with control over all your health, medical and fitness records.

Download HealthChampion today to get your no-cost ‚Äúearly adopter" access.

HealthChampion is a health & medical app that pulls in your health data from hospitals & health systems ‚Äì and many of the top fitness and medical devices (including Fitbit and Apple Health). The medical app provides an array of tools that leverages your data to get healthier, manage your healthcare costs and take control of your healthcare journey and destiny.

Use the medicine tracker, record symptoms and note your conditions automatically or in your private medical journal. From personal health to medical records, HealthChampion provides control and tools designed to empower families and individuals to finally control their health decisions and destiny.

The HealthChampion app is designed also empower caregivers ‚Äì whether you‚Äôre a parent or the adult child of seniors with special health needs. Care for elderly parents with chronic conditions or young kids learning to manage childhood conditions like asthma, allergies or diabetes.

Monitor prescriptions for your elder parent‚Äôs medication, track symptoms, manage your child‚Äôs treatment and follow their progress through one of our personalized health pathways. Plus, health observations and concerns can be recoded securely in the private journal.

HealthChampion gives you control over your health. From medication to managing symptoms, personal care is back in your hands.

Health Champion Features:

Personal Health Pathways
- Health improvement programs are clinically designed and personalized
- Health data can be recorded manually and wirelessly
- Access our growing library of clinically designed health improvement pathways
- Personal health care pathways are designed by medical, health and wellness professionals
- Personalized health care programs to achieve your specific health goals ‚Äì whether it‚Äôs losing 5 pounds, managing your child‚Äôs asthma or helping your elderly parent recover from a procedure

Care For Your Family
- Healthy living & care for your elderly parents or young children
- Track medicine, conditions and treatment for your family
- Track health, symptoms and medical progress, such as temperature and blood pressure

Recover Faster
- HealthChampion works with hospitals and surgery centers to improve patient care before and after procedures
- Let health care managers know how to best speed your recovery
- Medical providers can use HealthChampion for pre- and post-operation care

Health Data Stays Protected
- Health-related data is gathered from various apps, devices and the Internet of Things (IoT)
- HealthChampion gathers medical records & tracking data in a secure cloud-based environment
- Medical records stay secure and protected

Fitness Tracker Data
- Add tracking data from many leading fitness devices, including:
- Fitbit, Garmin, Withings, Omron, ActivLIFE, Apple Health, Bewell Connect, Boltt, Epson, iHealth, Kiqplan, Life Fitness, Lifetrak, Lumo, Mindful Meal, Misfit, Movable, MyFitnessPal, PearSports, Personalabs, Polar, Precor, Runkeeper, StepsCount, Strava, Striiv, Suunto, Swimtag, TomTom, Under Armour, and VitaDock

Medical Devices
- Collect and track data from top medical and vitals tracking devices, including:
-  Fitbit, Garmin, Omron, Withings (Nokia), AsthmaMD, Bewell Connect, BodiMetrics, Body Trace, Emfit, FatSecret, Foracare, Healthbot, Higi, iGlucose, iHealth, iProven, Kiqplan, Misfit, MyDario, Ozmo, PredictBGL (ManageBGL), Qardio, RxCheck, Sleepimage, Telcare, and VitaDock

We invite you to shape the future of consumer-driven health by becoming part of our community.
To get started, just download our free app today.

This is an amazing app that brings in automation! I get reminders that I can use outside of the app and can integrate all of my smart devices directly I to a consumable format!the covid 19 pathway helped me get ease of mind and great advice.

title: World Medical Card
description:
The World Medical Card‚Ñ¢ app is developed by WMC Technologies AS to provide an easy method of communicating with health professionals worldwide. Download and sign up for free, so you can start setting up your profile.


What is the World Medical Card‚Ñ¢ app?
The app offers a simple way to keep all your important information in one place. The World Medical Card‚Ñ¢ app is particularly useful when travelling, as it helps you to communicate with people who do not speak the same language as you. The app allows you to translate your medical and contact details into any of 19 different languages, thereby allowing you to communicate with local health professionals. This way you can avoid misunderstandings due to language barriers.

If you suffer from allergies you can use the app while dining out, to make sure you do not eat anything to which you may have an allergic reaction.

With the app from World Medical Card‚Ñ¢, you can collect your: 
- Allergies
- Diagnoses.
- Medications.
- Next of kin.
- Insurance information.
- And other information that might be useful for health professionals.
All at easy access for emergency and medical personnel at any given time available in 19 languages.

With World Medical Card‚Ñ¢ app you can translate your diagnoses and allergies to 19 languages, the languages currently available are:
Arabic
Serbian
Chinese
Finnish
Danish
Croatian
Italian
German
Turkish
Norwegian
Bosnian
Thai
Portuguese
French
Swedish
Japanese
English
Spanish
Russian

What is World Medical Card?
Our MISSION is ‚ÄúTo provide lifesaving information to give people peace of mind‚Äù
In Emergency Rooms all over the world, doctors face patients in urgent need of medical treatment. A factor that adds to this already demanding situation is the absence of relevant information concerning the patient‚Äôs medical history. Lack of information may jeopardize patient safety and it presents the doctors with a difficult dilemma:

If a patient is treated prematurely there is a risk of worsening the patient‚Äôs condition due to medical interactions or allergies unknown to the doctor.
On the other hand, if treatment is delayed in order to obtain information about allergies, medications and diagnoses, there is a risk of the patient getting worse while waiting.
WMC Technologies work to minimize suffering and save lives through providing the patient with a personal emergency medical information system that works 24/7 ‚Äì everywhere.

We offer our app and sign up for free, and the possibility to upgrade to our premium-subscription, where you get our physical card which will help emergency and medical personnel to even easier access your medical information. Set up your personal medical ID today.

title: SNUFF BOX-Allergy Cold Relief Flicker Beacon Light
description:
SNUFF BOX  is your own personal electronic Allergy Relief Snuff Box conveniently in your pocket. When using the different modes on the app you can bring forth an Sneeze Faster and get quick Relief for common cold or Allergy to facilitate an event. You can also use this APP for Common Cold or Flu. Snuff Box works best when used in the Dark or in the Night time. The Flicker Light can also be used as in Night time for spotting or as a Beacon light. 

Use white Light or Sun light mode which ever one helps you with your Sneeze.

There are Four Combo Buttons:

1. SNUFF NOW - Provides a Brilliant Super White Screen to induce an intense sneeze.

2. FLICKER MODE: Tickles the membranes so to engage a sneeze event.

3. FLASH MODE: Same as the Flicker Mode but at slower pace.

4. BOX ROLL: Controlled playful Sneeze 

Instructions are listed inside the APP - Enjoy!
